Gerges has been working as a farmer for the past eleven years; he really loves farming and wishes to spend the rest of his life working on his land. Today, he needs to borrow $2000 from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a mini van, which will help him transport his products in the fastest way. In the future, he plans to work with high tech materials in order to grow up his land.

loan.use: to purchase a mini van.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy day-old chicks and feed.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to purchase feed, chicks, and medicines.

loan.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah is a 47-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children. He is the main income provider in his family, and mentioned that his wife tries her best to take some responsibilities.
Abdallah is working as a cameraman. He has owned a studio since 1980 and hes an expert in his job. He also sells movies.
As for his wife, she has been working as a teacher in a local school for the past eleven years.
Abdallah is requesting a loan of $1,000 from Kiva partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase new equipment for his business such as cables, stands, films, and many other items.
In the future, he plans to increase his revenues in order to enlarge his shop.

loan.use: to purchase new equipment for his business such as cables, stands, films and many other items.

loan.name: Aviud De Jesus

texts.es: El seor Aviud a sus 49 aos de edad, es propietario de una tienda ubicada en el occidente de la ciudad de Medelln, en la cual trabaja hace tres aos. El seor Aviud tiene dos hijos de 8 y 15 aos de edad. La tienda le provee los ingresos con los cuales puede llevar la responsabilidad de su hogar. El seor Aviud desea comprar surtido como papel higinico, legumbres, snakcs, dulces, aceite, arroz, caf, entre otros productos con los cuales aumente su inventario y pueda generar mayores ingresos. El seor Aviud desea tener su propio mini mercado para generar empleos directos en su comunidad y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Seor Aviud is 49 years old and owns a shop located in the west part of the city of Medellin, where he has worked for the last 3 years. Seor Aviud has 2 children aged 8 and 15 years. His shop is his source of income with which he covers the household expenses. Seor Aviud wants to buy a variety of products such as toilet paper, vegetables, snacks, pastries, oil, rice and coffee amongst others with which to increase his inventory and generate more income. Seor Aviud wants to have his own minimart to generate jobs for the community and give his family a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy a variety of products such as toilet paper, fruit and vegetables, pastries, oil and coffee.

loan.name: Asmahan

texts.en: Asmahan is a 44-year-old woman who is married to Adnan, who is recently retired. They have six sons and daughters, one of whom is already married. After her husband's retirement, Asmahan bought a toy and childrens accessories shop for her and her husband to work in. It has been only two months since they started, but they are very optimistic about their shop and want to expand it to include more and more rare toys. Therefore, Asmahan has applied for this loan to decorate the shop and buy more toys. Because Asmahan is a conservative person, she asked her husband to appear in the photo instead.

loan.use: to decorate her toy shop and buy more toys.

loan.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is taking another Kiva loan of Kshs 20,000 to improve her motorcycle business and also start a charcoal selling business. With the loan, she wants to purchase spare parts to repair her motorcycle and purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.
She dreams of expanding her business to meet her customers demand in the future.

loan.use: to purchase spare parts to repair her motorcycle and sacks of charcoal for sale.

loan.name: Monzer

texts.en:
Monzer is a 61-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and three children, one of whom is working. Despite his older age, he is still courageous and brave, searching for a better life for his family.
He has owned a mini market in his town for the past 28 years. He has a good reputation and a fair number of loyal clients.
Today, he is asking for a loan of $1,000 from Kiva partner, Ameen s.a.l., to purchase additional inventory to add to his existing one. He notes that this Kiva loan will help him increase his business sales thus his income.
In the future, he plans to further expand his business.

loan.use: to purchase additional inventory to add to his existing one.

loan.name: San Roque Group

texts.es: San Roque lleva por nombre el grupo integrado por 25 mujeres D. la ciudad D. San Lorenzo, las cuales son todas amigas y vecinas D. esa ciudad. Ellas se unieron con el deseo D. progresar y D. salir adelante, ya que ellas desean darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos y familiares. Se definen como mujeres luchadoras, trabajadoras y muy honestas. Una D. esas mujeres muy trabajadoras es la seora Caren, quien con mucho esfuerzo y gracias a la venta D. sabanas que hace, ha podido ir creciendo y salir adelante. Comenta que le va muy bien ya que tiene muy buena venta pues ya tiene una clientela formada. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. ms sabanas con las cuales podr abastecerse y tener ms en stock, con lo que podr cumplir con sus clientes, agradece a la fundacin y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
San Roque is the name of the group which consists of 25 women from the city of San Lorenzo, all of whom are friends and neighbours from the same city. They got together with the desire to progress and get ahead as they wish to give their children and families a better future. They describe themselves as determined, hardworking and very honest women.
One of these hardworking women is Seora Caren who with a lot of effort and thanks to her sales of sheets, has been able to grow and get ahead. She says that she is doing very well as she has very good sales due to an established client base. She is asking for the loan to buy more sheets with which to stock up and have more in stock as well as be able to meet her customers' demands. She is grateful to both Kiva and the Fundacion for the opportunity they give her.

loan.use: to buy sheets for subsequent resale.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy stock for the shop.

loan.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 26-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and two siblings. He supports his brother, their main source of income, in order to satisfy their family's needs and to enrich their way of living.
Alaa has owned a vegetables shop since 2007 and he is looking forward to grow up his business. Today, he needs to borrow $1200 from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new products for his shop. This will certainly boost his productivity and augment his profits. In the future, he plans to deliver vegetable to the suburbs.

loan.use: to purchase new products for his shop.

loan.name: Tamam

texts.en: Tamam is a 40-year-old mother of six sons and daughters. Tamam and her husband Bassam work together selling clothes, blankets, and small electronics. They have been running this retail business for the last four years. Now Tamam has applied for a loan to add more products to their range in order to expand and reach more areas. In the future, they hope to open a separate store. Because Tamam is a conservative person, her husband Bassam has agreed to appear in the photo instead.

loan.use: to buy more clothes and products for resale.

loan.name: Thumu

texts.en: Thumu is taking another Kiva loan of KES 20,000 to boost her business. With the loan she wants to add more stock of hair weaves, cosmetics and oil. She dreams of expanding her business to satisfy her customers' needs in the future. Thumu is giving thanks to Yehu and Kiva lenders for giving her this loan to boost her business and to earn more income.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics and hair weaves.

loan.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 61-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. This couple strives to work really hard to spend the rest of their life properly. Joseph has owned a mini market since 2005 and he is waiting for the perfect time to enlarge his shop. As for his wife, she has been working as a teacher in a local school.
Today, Joseph is looking to borrow $1000 from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added supplies to enlarge the business. In the future, he notes that he will collect money, take a rest and retire to hire someone to work on his behalf.

loan.use: to purchase added supplies.

loan.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is taking another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to boost her business. With the loan, she wants to purchase a sewing machine, cloth materials and threads for her tailoring business. She dreams of establishing a tailoring school in the future. Her first Kiva loan has helped and improved her family's living standards.

loan.use: to purchase a sewing machine, cloth materials, threads for her tailoring business.

loan.name: Claudia Marcela

texts.es: La seora Claudia a sus 39 aos de edad, es madre de dos hijos de 18 y 13 aos de edad, uno de los cuales sufre de una enfermedad llamada Epilepsia y la cual para su tratamiento requiere de medicamentos muy costosos. La seora Claudia se dedica hace dos aos a la decoracin de alcobas para bebe y canecas para decorar habitaciones. Este oficio lo aprendi de su esposo con quien hoy en da no vive con ella. La seora Claudia desea comprar materia prima como pintura, lacas, barniz y juegos de alcoba para poder aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y a futuro tener un almacn y casa propia.
texts.en: Seora Claudia at her 39 years of age is the mother of 2 children, 18 and 13 years of age, one of whom suffers from epilepsy and needs expensive medicine to treat it. Seora Claudia decorates bedroom suites for babies and makes decorations for rooms. She learned this trade from her husband with whom she no longer lives. Seora Claudia wants to buy raw materials such as paints, varnishes and bedrooms sets so as to increase her income and improve her family's quality of life and in the future have a store and her own house.

loan.use: to buy raw materials such as paints, varnishes and a bedroom suite.

loan.name: Amina

texts.en: Amina is a 45-year-old Lebanese married woman. She lives with her husband and three children who are all working. Unlike other women in her place, shes the one responsible for her family and is their main income source. Amina strives to work really hard and doesn't hesitate to offer help whenever anyone needs it. Since 2003, she has owned a mini market where she also sells vegetables. Her business has succeeded, especially after being very welcoming and friendly. Today, she wants to borrow $2,500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy supplementary products to be able to grow her business. In the future, she plans to open a snack shop next to her mini market.

loan.use: to buy supplementary products.

loan.name: Mwango

texts.en:
Mwango, age 38, is married and lives in a rental house that has piped water but not electricity. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past 10 years, he has operated a business selling palm wine to his neighbors and passersby. He faces a major challenge of seasonality in his business.
With the 10,000 KES, he wants to purchase coconuts for making palm wine for sale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loan.use: to purchase coconuts for making palm wine for sale.

loan.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 30-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife, parents and one sibling. Ali happily helps support his father, and theyre both covering the family's needs and expenses. He has been working on his own for the past four years. His job consists of transporting cars in his tow truck so they may be fixed. Today, hes requesting to borrow $1500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform needed maintenance on his shuttle. This loan will allow him to carry on his job properly. In the future, he plans to have his own house and children.

loan.use: perform needed maintenance on his shuttle

loan.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel, age 27, is married and has two children, both of whom are still too young for school. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past 10 years, he has operated a business selling palm wine to his neighbors and passersby. He dreams of expanding his business in the future.
With the 20,000 KES, he wants to purchase coconuts to make palm wine. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loan.use: to purchase coconuts to make palm wine.

loan.name: Cerro Poty Group

texts.es: Las seoras del comit Cerro Poty, son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas estn muy agradecidas con la fundacin y con kiva por la oportunidad de progreso que les da. Actualmente est integrado por 15 mujeres, quienes trabajan muy a gusto dentro del programa, quieres salir adelante y de esa forma ayudar a sus familias. La presidenta, la Sra. Mara Lourdes vive con su marido e hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de confites, es decir de masitas dulces, tiene su negocio en el centro de la cuidad de Caacup. Comenta que tiene buena venta, y nos dice que una de sus metas es seguir creciendo para que de esa forma pueda seguir ayudando a su marido para mantener la casa. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de harina, azcar, dulces y dems insumos con los cuales elabora los confites que vende. Ella junto con sus compaeras realizan constantes actividades y de ese modo fomentar la integracin entre las compaeras y tratar de adelantar sus cuotas.
texts.en: The women of Cerro Poty Committee are hard working people. They are very grateful to the foundation and to kiva for the opportunity of progress that they have given them. Currently it is made up of 15 women who work very happily in the program and want to get ahead and thus help their families. The president, Mara Lourdes, lives with her husband and children. She sells sweets for a living, i.e. sweet pastries. She has her business in the downtown of the city of Caacup. She comments that she has good sales and tells us that one of her goals is to continue growing so that in this way she can continue helping her husband to keep the house. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, sweets and additional ingredients which produce the sweets that she sells. She, together with her partners, constantly conduct activities and thereby promote integration among the partners and try to continue with their payments.

loan.use: To buy flour, sugar, sweets and additional ingredients.

loan.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 29 years old and is married with two children aged between five and six years old. Her business is very clean and good. She sells various goods such as: cooking oil, soap, sugar, etc. She has two years experience in this business and employs one person to help her. Her business is open from 6am until 8pm everyday except on Sunday.
Beatrice has requested a loan from Kiva lender Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as: cooking oil, soap, sugar, etc. to sell. With any profit from the loan, Beatrice will expand her business and save money for her family.

loan.use: to expand her boutique by buying various goods such as: cooking oil, soap, sugar, etc. to sell.

loan.name: Natalia Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia naci en la ciudad del Lima y ahora vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Claudia tiene 37 aos de edad y tiene dos hijos.
Claudia desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y econmicas en la ciudad del Cusco. Desde hace 12 aos que trabaja en una tienda de venta de repuestos de carro pero actualmente Claudia se independizo y tiene su propio negocio. Ya son seis meses que se dedica a la venta de repuestos de carro de forma independiente.
Claudia pertenece al banco comunal ahupacman Purisun de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Claudia requiere el prstamo para comprar mercadera como por amortiguadores, sistema de refrigeracin, amortiguadores, soportes, pistones y otras cosas ms.
Claudia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Claudia was born in the city of Lima and now lives in Cusco. Claudia is 37 years old and has two children. Claudia conducts her daily and economic activity in the city of Cusco. For 12 years she has worked in a store that sells car parts but now Claudia has gone independent and started her own business. She has sold car parts independently for a living for 6 months now. Claudia belongs to the communal bank, ahupacman Purisun of the Arariwa Association of the city of Cusco. Claudia needs this loan buy goods such as shocks, cooling systems, shock absorbers, struts, pistons and other things. Claudia is thankful for the opportunity afforded by this means and likewise promises to comply with the corresponding payment schedule.

loan.use: To buy goods such as shocks, cooling systems, shock absorbers, struts, pistons and other things.

loan.name: Juana

texts.es: La socia Juana; sigue atendiendo su tienda de abarrotes y ella en esta ocasion requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra de champan, vino, panetones, galletas, productos de primera necesidad como harinas, azucar, arroz, leche, chocolate entre otros productos de salida diaria y ahora que esta cerca la navidad la socia implementara sus tienda de abarrotes con panetones, vino, champan, chocolates, y otros productos. La socia desea ampliar a futuro su tienda y tambin vender adornos, peluches, regalos, un poco de libreria en mercaderia basica como lapiceros, papeles de escritorio entre otros. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de champan, azucar, arroz, chocolate, vino, panetones y otros.
texts.en: The member, Juana, continues operating her grocery store and on this occasion she requires a loan to invest in the purchase of champagne, wine, panettones , cookies, and staples such as flours, sugar, rice, milk and chocolate among other products of daily output. Now that Christmas is near, the member will stock her grocery store with panettones, wine, champagne, chocolates and other products. The associate wants to expand her store in the future and also to sell decorations, stuffed animals, gifts, a small library of basic goods such as pens and stationary among other things. The member requests the loan to invest in the purchase of champagne, sugar, rice, chocolate, wine, panettones and others.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of Christmas items.

loan.name: Adam

texts.en:
Adam is a 35-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has three children between the ages of 1 and 7. One of his children goes to school.
Adam runs a mixed food store business, and he has been in the business for seven years. He has one employee. Adam is requesting a loan of 3,000 SDG to purchase items like powdered milk, powdered orange juice, sugar, etc. Adam has no other source of income.
In five years' time, Adam hopes to have two food markets. His major challenge is paying for home expenses.
Adam wishes to thank Kiva for supporting people's lives and families in South Sudan.

loan.use: to purchase items like powdered milk, powdered orange juice, sugar, etc. for his food store.

loan.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen Rosa naci en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde naci. Carmen Rosa tiene 38 aos de edad y tiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. Carmen Rosa desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y econmicas en la ciudad del Cusco.
Carmen Rosa se dedica a la venta de libros de forma ambulatoria, ella trabaja desde las 9 de la maana hasta las 6 de la tarde de lunes y sbados. Ya son varios aos que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias a al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
Carmen Rosa pertenece al banco comunal ahupacman Purisun de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Carmen Rosa requiere el prstamo para comprar libros y revistas.
Carmen Rosa se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city where she was born. She is 38 years old and has a common-law relationship from which she has three children. Carmen Rosa carries out her daily and business activities in the city of Cusco.
Carmen Rosa works selling books as a street vendor. She works from 9 in the morning until 6 in the afternoon from Monday through Saturday. She has been working in this business for several years now, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.
Carmen Rosa belongs to ahupacman Purisun Communal Bank, of Asociacin Arariwa in the city of Cusco. She needs the loan to buy books and magazines.
Carmen Rosa is grateful for the opportunity offered by this loan, and she also is committed to making her payments according to the schedule.

loan.use: to buy books and magazines.

loan.name: Rickson

texts.en:
Rickson, 38, is a married man with eight children, seven of whom attend school. He owns a house that has electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
For the past fourteen years, he has operated a retail shop business, selling to his neighbors and passersby. In addition he also owns real estate houses, which provide another source of income. He dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.
With the loan of KES 20,000 he wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loan.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar.

loan.name: Solidario Las Sunamitas Group

texts.es: Solidario Las Sunamitas: Este Grupo Esta conformado por doa francisca ella es una persona que es muy responsabe muy luchadora,ella se dedica a la venta y a la confeccion de tejidos tipicos lleva ya 8 aos de dedicarse a esta actividad,ella nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque a parte de ser un motivo de entrada economica le ayuda a cuidar a sus hijos porque ella confecciona en su casa,es por eso que ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos,al igual que la siguentes socias estan solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos.
texts.en: One of the members of the Solidarity Group Las Sunamitas is Doa Francisca, a very responsible and hard-struggling woman. She weaves and sells typical fabrics. She has had this activity for eight years and is very happy with it for two reasons: it gives her an income and she can care for her children while weaving because she works at home. She applies for this loan to buy raw material for weaving. Similarly, her fellow group members need a loan for the same purpose.

loan.use: to buy raw materials to weave traditional fabrics.

loan.name: Danila

texts.es: La socia Daniela; actualemnte sigue con el negocio de los cueros, ella produce cartearas, bolsos, monederos, carutcheras, billeteras, la socia trabaj comprando cuero al por mayor y en todo grosor, la socia tambien compra cuero ya trabajado como los de color entre otros materiales para poder fabricar, carteras, la socia en esta ocasion desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de carteras, monedoros entre otros articulos, la socia es ambulante y ella desea tener un talelr bien implementado y poder tambien exhibir su mercaderia, ella trabaja muy duro para apoyar en casa a la educacion y a la mejor calidad de sus hijos. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la elaboracion de carteras, monederos, billeteras entre otros productos en base a cuero.
texts.en: Daniela continues with her leather business. She manufactures small bags, bags, coin purses, pencil cases and wallets. She buys wholesale leather of various types, as well as processed and dyed leather and other raw materials for manufacturing her bags. This time, Daniela wants to use her loan for purchasing the materials needed for manufacturing bags, purses and other products. She is a street vendor but wants to have a fully set workshop where she can also exhibit her products. She works very hard in order to support her children's education and quality of life. Daniela is asking for this loan to purchase raw materials needed for manufacturing leather bags, purses and wallets.

loan.use: purchase raw materials for manufacturing bags, purses, wallets and other products made of leather

loan.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 25 year-old businessman, who lives in Juba. He is married and has 2 children between the ages of 3 and 1. Neither goes to school.
Henry runs a mixed-food store, and he has been in the business for 6 years. He has one employee. Henry heard about Finance Sudan through the promotion done by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 3000 SDG to purchase items like powdered milk, tang juice, sugar, rice and many others.
Because he is renting now, Henry hopes to build his own shop in 5 years time. His major challenges include competitors, and home expenses. Henry says that, first of all, he has alot of appreciation for Finance Sudan for their support.

loan.use: to purchase items like powdered milk, Tang juice, sugar, rice and many others.

loan.name: Celia

texts.es: La socia sigue administrando y mejorando su negocio de restaurante, la socia poco a pococ podra hacer realidad su negocio ella pondra en sus mismo local un horno para sacar polllo a la braza, pero por ahora la socia requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos al por mayor, ahora que los productos subieron ella desea invertir en la compra de arroz en bolsas, aceite por bidones, fideos, sal en bolsas, entre otros productos. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para implementar sus tienda y para poder elaborar sus comidas caseras y extras, la socia seguira trabajando para concretar sus proyectos a corto plazo.
texts.en:
The member continues managing and improving her restaurant business. Little by little she will be able to make her business a reality. In her same place she will install an oven to make barbecued chicken, but for now she needs the loan to invest in buying products wholesale. Now that the products went up she wants to invest in buying bags of rice, cans of oil, vermicelli, bags of salt, and other products.
The member is requesting the loan to buy household necessity items to set up her store and to be able to make her homemade and additional meals.
She will continue working to realize her short-term projects.

loan.use: to buy household necessities to set up her store and to make her homemade and additional meals.

loan.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es: El grupo Santa Librada es D. la ciudad D. Encarnacin, ellas son amigas y vecinas D. esa ciudad, ellas tienen muchas ganas D. progreso, es por ello que trabajan en forma conjunta a parte del trabajo individual que hacen, para que D. esa forma puedan ayudarse las unas a las otras. Son muy conocidas en su barrio por la forma en que trabajan. Una D. las integrantes es la seora Yolanda, ella se dedica a la venta D. todo tipo D. comestibles, como ser empanadas, sandwish, croquetas y dems. Nos comenta que tiene muchas ventas pues los alimentos que prepara son muy pedidos. Gracias a este trabajo ella pueD. ayudar en la casa con los gastos. Ella piD. la ayuda D. kiva y la fundacin para la compra D. carne, pollo, condimentos, panificados y dems insumos para elaborar sus alimentos.
texts.en:
The group Santa Librada is from the city of Encarnacin. They are friends and neighbours from this city and are very keen to get ahead which is why they work together as well as working individually, so that they can help each other. They are very well-known in the neighbourhood for the way in which they work. One of the members is Seora Yolanda who sells all kinds of food such as empanadas, sandwiches, croquets and others. She tells us that she has a lot of sales as the food she makes is very sought after. With this work she can help with the household expenses.
She is asking for Kiva's and the Fundacion's help to buy meat, chicken, seasonings, baked goods and other ingredients to make her food.

loan.use: to buy chicken, meat, seasonings, baked goods and other products.

loan.name: Adham

texts.en: Adham is a 21-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents. In order to return with more income to the family, he decided to open his own business, which consists in selling a wide range of sweets. He has a good number of customers passing by his shop and he is well known by his tasty goods. Today, he is asking to borrow $1500 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l, to purchase additional sweets and pastries to sell. In the future, he plans to further expand his business.

loan.use: To purchase additional sweets and pastries to sell

loan.name: George

texts.en: George is a 21-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and one sibling. Despite his young age, George man was able to start his business two years ago working as a painter. His income is needed to help support his family. Today, he is requesting a loan of $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy more tools and purchase painting products. In the future, George plans to open his own painting shop.

loan.use: To buy tools and purchase painting products

loan.name: Cynthia

texts.en: Cynthia is a 22-year-old Lebanese single woman living with her parents. Shes a brave and talented young woman looking for a better future. She has been working as a beautician since 2009 providing customers with beauty services wherever they are located. Cynthia is friendly and knows very well how to gain and maintain her customers. Today, she asking to borrow $700 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase cosmetics and beauty supplies in order to satisfy her customers needs. In the future, Cynthia plans to open her own beauty salon.

loan.use: To purchase cosmetics and beauty supplies

loan.name: Muhamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 54 year old business man, who lives in Juba. He is married and has 6 children between the ages of 25 and 10. 3 of them go to school.
Mohamad runs a mixed food store business, and he has been in the business for 3 years. He has no employees. Mohamad heard about Finance Sudan through the outreach and promotion done by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 2000 SDG to purchase items like tomato paste, cooking oil, saltand other products. This is Mohamad's has only source of income. His major challenges include competitors and the high cost of living in Juba.
In 5 years time, Mohamad would hopes to build his own shop.
Mohamad says, "God bless the owners of Finance Sudan for this opportunity to happen in Sudan".

loan.use: to purchase items like tomato paste, cooking oil, salt and other products.

loan.name: Luz Clarita Group

texts.es:
La A.C. LUZ CLARITA iniciar su cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal German Busch, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Mara Isabel. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Tejido, venta de comida, tienda de estuco, venta de CDs, tejido en macram.
La seora Mara Isabel, indica que hace dos aos trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de promotores. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de estuco que viene trabajando hace aos, aprendiendo el mismo de su esposo.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de estuco) que comprara de las personas que le traen de provincia y posteriormente lo vender en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene cinco hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el rea de salud.
En la fotografa acompaa al grupo la hija de una de las socias que se encuentra detras de la seora de manta verde
texts.en:
The communal bank "Luz Clarita" ("Clear Light") will take out their fourth loan cycle through Pro Mujer as part of the German Busch regional office. The group is composed of eight members and is directed by a board led by Maria Isabel. The businesses undertaken by the members of the communal bank are varied; they include weaving, sales of food, a stucco store, sales of CDs, and macrame.
Maria Isabel says that she began working in Pro Mujer two years ago and that she became involved with the organization at the invitation of promoters. She has a business that sells stucco, which she has been doing for years, learning the trade from her husband.
This loan is to increase her working capital (to purchase stucco), which she will buy from people who bring it from the province. Afterward, she will sell it in her sales space. This work allows her to earn income to support her family, as she lives with her partner and has five children.
When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Maria Isabel responds that she likes the subject of health.
In the photograph, the daughter of one of the partners appears behind the woman in the green shawl.

loan.use: To buy stucco.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy animals to breed.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: purchase lambs to re-sell

loan.name: Esperanza Del Socorro

texts.es: La seora Esperanza Del Socorro de 55 aos de edad quien se dedica a la venta de tiste y bolsas plsticas. Es una seora muy dedicada, ella le gusta este trabajo desde que la despidieron de su empleo. Ella quiere este crdito para la compra de maz, azcar, cacao y bolsa entre otro. Ella se levanta desde muy temprano para la elaboracin del tiste. Pero a la seora esperanza le gustara ampliar ms su negocio para seguir manteniendo a su familia.
texts.en:
Esperanza del Socorro is 55 years old. She sells tiste (a popular regional drink made of toasted corn and ground cocoa) and plastic bags. She is a very hardworking woman. She likes this work, as she was let go from her previous job.
She wants this loan to buy corn, sugar, cocoa, and bags, among other things. She wakes up very early in the morning to make tiste, but Esperanza would like to further expand her business to continue providing for her family.

loan.use: To buy corn, sugar, cocoa, and bags.

loan.name: Federman

texts.es: El seor Federman a sus 63 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de mercanca como estuches para controles de televisin y equipos de sonido, pilas (bateras) para pequeos electrodomsticos y controles para televisin. Esta labor el seor Federman la realiza desde hace 15 aos y con la cual a sacado adelante a su esposa y cinco hijos. El seor Federman decidi realizar este trabajo porque le permite estar cerca a su familia y dedicarles ms tiempo; el trabajo que realizaba anteriormente era de mayordomo en fincas muy alejado de su familia. El seor Federman desea comprar mercanca para poder ampliar su surtido y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos y capital de trabajo y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Federman is 63 years old and sells merchandise such as cases for both television remote controls and sound systems, batteries for small appliances, and television remote controls. Federman has been doing this work for 15 years, and with this employment he has supported his wife and five children.
Federman decided to start this job because it allowed him to be close to his family and spend more time with them. Previously, he worked as a steward in farms located very far away from his family.
Federman hopes to buy merchandise to expand his selection. In doing so, he can increase his income and working capital, and provide his family with a better quality of life.

loan.use: To buy merchandise such as batteries, television remote controls, sound systems, and cases.

loan.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia, de 30 aos, vive en su casa propia en compaa de su esposo y sus 3 menores hijos, Jack, Luis y Beto; juntos buscan que salir adelante a base de mucho esfuerzo y trabajo en la localidad de Carampa, que es donde viven. Cada da Silvia se despierta al amanecer y se dirige hacia sus campos de maz, junto con su esposo para vigilar sus tierras, pues la cosecha futura debe ser muy productiva, saben que con mucho esfuerzo lo lograrn. La agricultura, segn dice es una actividad que le genera ganancias regulares que le permiten brindar a su familia una adecuada calidad de vida le gusta sembrar las tierras ya que sabe cmo hacerlo, lo que no le gusta son las constantes plagas que muchas veces arruinan gran parte de la cosecha, por eso es necesario la constante vigilancia. Paralelamente se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, ya que ante cualquier emergencia que se le presente puede vender alguno y ganar dinero .Como es una dama muy luchadora tiene muchos planes para progresar, entre ellos se encuentra el de comprar mayor cantidad de ganado vacuno para continuar en la comercializacin. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario carampa y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Silvia, de recibir su apoyo invertir el dinero en la compra fertilizantes para esparcir entre sus sembros.
texts.en:
Silvia is 30 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and their three minor children; Jack, Luis, and Beto. Together they look to get ahead through much effort and work in Carampa, which is where they live.
Silvia gets up at dawn and heads towards the corn fields with her husband in order to tend to their land. The future harvest should be very productive. They know that with much effort they will attain a good harvest.
Farming, according to her, is a business activity that generates regular income. This allows her to offer her family an adequate quality of life. She likes to plant the fields because she knows how to do so. What she does not like are the constant pest infestations that often ruin a big part of the harvest. That is why constant vigilance is necessary.
At the same time she raises cattle because she can sell some and make money when faced with any emergency. As a very tenacious woman, she has lots of plans to make progress. Among these plans is to buy more cattle in order to continue selling them.
She belongs to the Carampa communal bank, and this is her third loan with MFP. She is happy because she receives support from all of you, which allows her to continue with her business. She pledges to be punctual with her payments. Her association is comprised of responsible and supportive people. Upon receiving your support she will buy fertilizers to spread among her plants.

loan.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loan.name: Eucalda

texts.es: Eucalda, de 36 aos, vive en su casa propia en compaa de su esposo, Arturo y sus 3 hijos; Gisela, Erika y Fanny a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Carampa. Desde que era muy pequea aprendi lo que era necesario para la correcta siembra y produccin de las tierras; de esta manera cuando se uni a su esposo no dudo, junto con l, en seguir trabajando la tierra y empezaron con la siembra de maz. Tiempo despus vieron que las ganancias de las ventas del maz, les permitan sustentar muy bien a su familia, adems de darles educacin a sus hijas que era lo que ms interesaba. Ha pasado el tiempo y continua sembrando maz, adems paralelamente tambin se dedica a la crianza de ganado porcino, que engorda, para luego comercializar en las ferias de la zona por donde vive, y la actividad le da buenas ganancias, que junto a las de la siembra le permite ofrecer una buena calidad de vida a su familia .Como es una mujer muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado sembrar alverja, ya que sabe que el precio de esta legumbre est muy alto en el mercado. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario carampa y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Eucalda de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero en la compra de semilla de alverja y varios sacos de fertilizantes para su prxima siembra.
texts.en: Eucalda, 36, lives in her own house with her husband, Arturo, and their three children, Gisela, Erika and Fanny. She takes care of them in her own house, located in Carampa. At an early age Eucalda learned how to sow and reap correctly. That is why when she joined her husband, she had no doubt that they would keep on working with agriculture and they started planting maize. They realized that the income from maize allowed them to cater very well for their family and to provide their children with education, which was their priority. Time has passed by and Eucalda still plants maize. She combines this with raising pigs. She raises them and then sells them at local fairs around her community, which enables her to offer her family a good quality of life. Eucalda has a very entrepreneurial spirit and plans to grow green peas in the near future because she knows the market price for this produce is very high. She belongs to solidarity group Carampa and this is her fourth loan with the institution, where she feels happy because she receives support from all of you who allow her to stay in business. She also promises to repay on time because her group is made up of responsible and supportive people. If Eucalda gets support, she will invest her money in the purchase of green pea seeds and several sacks of fertilizers for her next planting season.

loan.use: to purchase green pea seeds and sacks of fertilizers

loan.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es: El seor Jorge Ivn desde los 10 aos de edad aprendi de su padre la elaboracin de herraduras y desde entonces se dedica a esta labor acompaado de sus dos hijos a quienes les ense esta labor. El seor Jorge Ivn compra metal para fabricar las herraduras en el taller que tiene en el patio de su casa y el producto terminado lo vende a un mayorista del municipio de Sonson ubicado en el occidente de Antioquia. El seor Jorge desea comprar hierro y carbn para continuar con la elaboracin de las herraduras y de esta manera lograr mayores ingresos y as mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
When Jorge Ivn was ten years old he learned from his father how to make horseshoes. From then on he has devoted himself to this work. He taught his two children this work, and they work with him.
Jorge Ivn buys metal in order to make the horseshoes in his workshop, which is on the patio of his house. He sells the finished product to a wholesaler in the Sonson municipality to the west of Antioquia.
Jorge wishes to buy more iron and coal to continue making the horseshoes. That way he will attain greater income and improve his familys quality of life.

loan.use: to buy raw material like iron and coal.

loan.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora D. 64 aos vive en compaa D. su esposo y uno D. sus hijos, en la localidad D. San Pedro D. Sao. Hace 6 aos abri su tienda D. comestibles en su propia casa a fin D. poder tener una vida ms tranquila, ella y su esposo se jubilaron es por eso que desean seguir trabajando pero D. manera independiente, es as que Doa Teodora es la encargada principal D. la atencin D. su establecimiento en las cuales los das; donD. recibe mayores ganancias es cuando son las fechas muy festivas en su localidad como las fiestas patronales, fiestas patrias, da D. los santos, etc. Teodora no desaprovecha ninguna oportunidad para crecer es por ello que siempre esta al pendiente D. innovar y mejorar su tienda para mantenerse activa. Ella pertenece al grupo oslidario Cantuta y este es el sexto crdito con MFP, donD. se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo D. todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago D. sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Teodora D. recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en surtir su tienda D. comestibles para esta campaa naviD.a.
texts.en:
Teodora, 64, lives with her husband and one of her children in the town of San Pedro D. Sao. Six years ago she opened her general store in her own house to be able to have a more peaceful life. She and her husband retired, so they want to continue working, but independently.
In this way Teodora is the main one in charge of their business. They receive the greatest profits on the most festive days in their town, such as patron saint days, national holidays, birthdays, etc. Teodora does not miss any opportunity to grow, which is why she always devotes time to making innovations and improving her store, to keep it productive.
She belongs to the Cantuta solidarity group, and this is her sixth loan with MFP. She feels happy about it since she is receiving the support of all of you, who allow her to continue with her business. She also promises to be punctual in making her payments, since her bank is maD. up of responsible and supportive people.
When Teodora receives her support she will invest the money requested in supplying her store for the Christmas season.

loan.use: to buy sweets and various products for her store.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy raw materials to weave traditional fabrics.

loan.name: Elva

texts.es: Elva, de 21 aos, es una mujer del campo. Vive en compaa de su mam Graciela y sus 3 hermanos: Jos, Sayuri y Alex a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Armaspampa. Hace poco vendi los 2 toros que posea. Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales como las 15 ovejas, 3 vacas y toros que posee; los que alimenta para luego engordarlos y venderlos al mejor postor. Le va muy bien en su negocio y le gusta ello, ya que as puede ayudar a sus hermanos y a Graciela, su mam, que es una valiente madre soltera. De la misma manera cuenta con sembros de papa, cebada, alverja, habas y trigo, los que realiza en terrenos agrcolas propios, cuenta que posee 2 hectreas que en cada cosecha producen los alimentos que comercializa en la feria de Acostambo. Ahora ella desea aumentar su ganado ya que vendi muchos y ahora se quedo con pocos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario Jatum Llacta y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboracin para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Adems le agrada ser parte de su asociacin, porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Elva, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlo entre sus cultivos de papa yungay.
texts.en:
Elva, 21, is a country woman. She lives with her mother Graciela and her three siblings, Jos, Sayuri, and Alex, whom she takes care of in her own home, located in the community of Armaspampa.
A short time ago she sold the two bulls that she had. She works raising animals, such as her fifteen sheep, three cows, and bulls, which she feeds to fatten and later sell. It is going very well for her in her business and she likes this, since in this way she can help her siblings and Graciela, her mother, who is a courageous single mother. At the same time, she has potato, barley, pea, bean, and wheat crops, which she grows on her own croplands. She says she has two hectares that in each harvest produce food that she sells in the market of Acostambo.
Now she wants to increase her livestock since she sold many animals and has only a few remaining.
She belongs to the Jatum Llacta solidarity group, and this is her first loan with MFP. She hopes for your collaboration so she can realize her plans. On the other hand, she promises to make her payments. Also, she likes to be part of her bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.
When Elva receives her support she will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizer to spread on her crop of Yungay potatoes.

loan.use: to buy bags of fertilizer.

loan.name: Oumou Khair

texts.fr: Madame Oumou Khair est marie et vit au Sngal. Elle est mre de 3 enfants dont lge varie entre 5 et 12 ans. Elle est ge de 32 ans et sactive dans le commerce et la vente de tissus, portables, prt porter, etc. Elle a une exprience de 2 ans dans son activit. Cest un choix quelle a fait pour pouvoir travailler pour son propre compte et satisfaire ses besoins personnels. Elle est membre de lun des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis septembre 2011 et sollicite un crdit de 400 000 frs prvu pour lachat de tissus teints qui seront destins a la vente. Son objectif avec ce financement est de renforcer son chiffre daffaire, de gagner une part plus importante du march et largir son activit de commerce.
texts.en: Mrs Oumou Khair is a 32 year old married woman living in Senegal, and a mother of three children aged 5 to 12. She has been involved in the sale of cloth, mobile phones, ready to wear clothing, etc for the past two years. She made this choice in order to work on her own conditions and to satisfy her personal needs. She has been a member of the UIMCEC bank since September 2011 and is asking for a loan of 400,000 francs [approximately 820 USD] to purchase dyed cloth to be re-sold. Her goal with this financing is to receive more revenues, gain market share and increase her retail activity.

loan.use: purchase cloth to re-sell

loan.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar, de 32 aos es un hombre feliz. Pues vive en compaa de su esposa Ronaldina, desde hace 12 aos. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, todos ellos menores a lo que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Vista Alegre. Sus constates viajes a las diferentes ferias del pas, hacen que obtenga buenas ganancias. Todo ello gracias a la comercializacin de animales como: ovejas, vacas, toros, burros y caballos. Segn cuenta gana un promedio de 100 nuevos soles por cada ejemplar. Su trabajo es esforzado, pues tiene que viajar mucho. Despus de cada viaje, dispone un mes para descansar; en ese tiempo aprovecha para cuidar de sus cultivos de papa y cebada los que en cada cosecha comercializa a la feria de Acostambo, que se realiza todos los viernes de cada semana. Cuenta que su economa es estable, todo gracias a su esposa quien administra las ganancias y cuida de los cultivos cuando l est ausente. l pertenece al grupo solidario Jatum Llacta y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboracin para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Adems le agrada ser parte de su asociacin, porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Edgar, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado vacuno.
texts.en:
Edgar, 32, is a happy man since he has lived with his wife Ronaldina for 12 years. Together they have four children, all of them minors whom they care for in their own home, located in the community of Vista Alegre.
His constant trips to different markets in the country allow for him to make good profits, all thanks to selling animals such as sheep, cows, bulls, burros, and horses. As he tells it, he earns an average of 100 PEN for each animal.
His work is demanding, since he has to travel a lot. After each trip his takes a month to rest. He takes advantage of that time to take care of his potato and barley crops, which at each harvest he sells in the market in Acostambo, which is every Friday. He says his finances are stable, all thanks to his wife who manages the profits and takes care of the crops when he is away.
He belongs to the Jatum Llacta solidarity group, and this is his first loan with MFP. He hopes for your collaboration so he can realize his plans. On the other hand, he promises to make his payments. In addition, he enjoys being part of his bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.
When Edgar receives his support he will invest the requested money in buying several heads of cattle.

loan.use: to buy cows and bulls.

loan.name: Luz Mariela

texts.es: La seora Luz Mariela a sus 45 aos de edad, se dedica a la produccin y venta de arepas desde su casa; las arepas son un alimento tradicional de Antioquia y es elaborada con maz. Esta idea inicio de su esposo quien la nimo para que se dedicara a esta labor y de esta forma dejar su anterior trabajo que no le permita estar mucho tiempo con sus 6 hijos. Actualmente la seora Luz Mariela desea comprar un nuevo fogn para la fabricacin de las arepas y adquirir materia prima como el maz, lo anterior le permitira a ella producir en mayor cantidad y menor tiempo las arepas y as tener mayores ingresos. La seora Luz Mariela suea con tener su propia fbrica de arepas y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Mariela is 45 years old, and she makes and sells arepas from her home. Arepas are made with corn and are a traditional dish from Antioquia (the Department in which Fredonia is located).
Her husband gave her the idea for this business and encouraged her to do this work. In doing so, she could leave her previous job, which did not leave her much time with her six children.
Luz Mariela wants to buy a new stove to make the arepas and purchase raw materials, such as corn. This will allow her to produce more arepas in less time, thus increasing her income. Luz Mariela dreams of having her own arepas factory and improving her family's quality of life.

loan.use: To buy a stove and raw materials such as corn.

loan.name: Pilar

texts.es: Pilar, de 20 aos es una joven madre soltera. Vive en el casero de Acolla, junto a su madre e hijo Damian. Gracias al terreno que le hered su mam ella puede sembrar papa, maz y alverja, esto le permite adquirir algunos ingresos para su hijo y ella. Cuenta que en pocas de cosecha trabaja como pen en otros terrenos agrcolas, as puede juntar dinero para su prxima siembra. Aun cuenta con pequeos sembros pero eso no la desanima, ya que tiene las ganas de seguir triunfando sobre todo porque es una mujer que no se rinde con facilidad. Ahora desea abrir peluquera, ya dio el primer paso con la adquisicin de un pequeo local, donde comenzar a realizar cortes, peinados y maquillajes, puso sillas y espejos. Le falta muy poco y est segura de concretar su objetivo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Pilar de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero del prstamo en la compra de utensilios para su peluquera.
texts.en:
Pilar is 20 years old and a single mother. She lives in the Acolla neighborhood, together with her mother and her son, Damian. Thanks to the land that her mother inherited, she can plant potatoes, corn, and peas; this provides some income for herself and her son. During periods of harvest, she also works as a laborer in other farms so she can raise money her next planting. Her few crops do not discourage her. She desires to triumph over everything because she is a woman who does not give up easily.
Now, she would like to open a beauty salon. Pilar already took the first step by acquiring a small premises where she will begin to cut and style hair, as well as do makeup for her patrons. She has set up seats and mirrors; she only needs a few remaining things and is sure of realizing her goal.
She belongs to the communal bank "Mujeres Luchadores" ("Fighting Women"). This is her first loan with MFP, where she hopes for all of your support to achieve her goal. She promises to make her loan payments punctually, as her communal bank is composed of responsible individuals who support each other. Upon receiving your support, Pilar will invest the loan to purchase items for her hair salon.

loan.use: To buy materials for her beauty salon.

loan.name: Rosmery

texts.es: Rosmery de 46 aos de edad vive en el municipio de Malambo y tiene una hija de 27 aos. All se dedica a la venta de mercanca variada como sabanas, ropa en general, calzado, bolsos entre otros productos que le encargan sus clientes, porque vende a crdito en plazos adaptados a las necesidades de estos. En sus inicios como emprendedora, se dedicaba a la venta de prendas de plata y as fue como logr una primera clientela domstica que poco a poco fue creciendo, con el oportuno servicio que le ofreca Rosmery y gradualmente le permiti agregar todos los productos como hasta hoy lo hace. Con su negocio ha logrado pagar la educacin de su hija, a quien ha sacado adelante con su propio esfuerzo, pues es profesional de la contadura pblica y ahora ella la apoya con los gastos comunes del hogar. El sueo de Rosmery es ampliar su negocio y algn da comprar su propio vehculo. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer credikiva, con el cual comprar calzado, bolsos, prendas de vestir, pues se acerca la temporada de mayor rentabilidad para su negocio, porque se incrementan tradicionalmente los pedidos que hacen sus clientes y esto es justamente en lo cual basa su inversin y planea que sea exitosa pues con dinero efectivo, lograr compras en mayor cantidad y con mejores descuentos, lo cual trasladar a sus utilidades.
texts.en:
Rosmery is 46 years old, lives in the municipality of Malambo, and has a 27-year old daughter. There, she works selling various merchandise, such as sheets, clothes, footwear, and bags, which she provides to her clients on credit with installment periods tailored to their needs. When she began as an entrepreneur, she sold silver items, and through that, she found her first domestic customers. These customers began to grow, little by little, with the useful service that Rosmery offered them. Gradually she was able to accumulate all the products like the ones she sells today.
With her business, she has paid for the education of her daughter, who has succeeded by her own efforts. Her daughter is now a professional accountant and helps Rosmery with some of the household expenses. Rosmery's dream is to expand her business and, one day, to buy her own car.
She is applying for her first loan, which she will use to buy footwear, bags, articles of clothing. The most profitable period for her business is approaching, because her customers usually begin asking for more things. This is the reason for her desired investment. She plans to succeed because with cash, she will be able to buy more with better discounts, which will translate into profits for her.

loan.use: To buy shoes, bags, and items of clothing.

loan.name: Issa

texts.fr: Monsieur Issa est un jeune commerant de 30 ans qui vit au Sngal. Il est clibataire et volue depuis 1998 dans la commercialisation de denres alimentaires, oignons, pomme de terre, ails et autres produits divers. Il a choisi son activit par passion et aussi dans le but de rechercher la possibilit de se prendre en charge, Car trouver un emploi dans le secteur formel devient un vritable calvaire. Ce qui lintresse le plus dans son activit cest son aspect lucratif et les relations quil tisse avec les clients. Il est socitaire de lun des guichets de lU-IMCEC de la localit ou il habite depuis un an. Il sollicite un crdit de 300 000 frs prvu pour lachat de produits alimentaires en vue de renouveler et ou renforcer son stock et pouvoir rpondre a la demande croissante de la clientle. Son intention est de largir son activit de commerce.
texts.en: Mr Issa is a young 30 year old business man living in Senegal. He is single and has been working in the retail sector since 1998, selling food products such as onions, potatoes, garlic and other products. Her is passionate about his business and also enjoys being self-employed. He is most interested by the viability of his business as well as the relationships he is able to cultivate with this clients. He has been a member of the UIMCEC bank where he lives for the past year. He is asking for a loan of 300,000 francs [approximately X USD] in order to purchase food products in larger quantities and be able to address the demands of his clients. He would like to increase the activity of his business.

loan.use: purchase food products to re-sell

loan.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Esther; La socia tiene 58 aos de edad, ella es soltera; y tiene 1 hijo, la socia se dedica actualmente al negocio de venta de tamales y tambien se dedica a la venta de artesania,ella hace collares,pulseras y aretes y lo vende al por mayor,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de tamales y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesania. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar insumos como maiz,manteca y azucar para preparar los tamales y tambien comprar hilos y alambres para hacer los aretes,collares y pulseras.
La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Esther is 58 years old, single, and has a son. Her present business is selling tamales and also, artisan crafts: she makes bracelets, and earrings and sell them at wholesale. By means of these businesses, she advances her son. Esther wishes to expand and improve both businesses, the sales of tamales and artisan crafts. She requests a loan to buy supplies such as corn, lard, and sugar to prepare tamales and also, to buy thread and wire to make earrings, necklaces and bracelets.
Esther is grateful and values the loan offered through this medium and, at the same time, promises to comply with her payments as scheduled.

loan.use: to buy supplies such as corn, lard and sugar to prepare tamales, and also to buy thread and wire to make earrings, necklaces, and bracelets to sell.

loan.name: Benancia

texts.es: La seora Benancia nacio en la Provincia Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vive en la comunidad de Chaqui Cocha km 76 sobre la carretera antigua a Santa Cruz. La vivienda que habita la clienta es rustico de las caractersticas de adobe y techo de paja prcticamente rustico. La actividad a que se dedica es la agricultura que produce los tubrculos y cereales en su comunidad, los trabajos agrcolas realizan toda la familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos en ayne y mink'a. El presente crdito est solicitando para la compra de insumos agrcolas de esa manera mejorar el incremento de su actividad econmica y la calidad de vida en la familia.
texts.en: Benancia was born in Tiraque province, Department of Cochabamba. She currently lives in the Chaqui Cocha community, on the 76th km of the old Santa Cruz road. She lives in a rustic house with adobe walls and straw roofs. Benancia makes a living of agriculture and produces cereals and root vegetables for her community. She plants with the help of her family and, occasionally, her neighbors in collaborative schemes such as ayne and minka. Benancia is asking for this loan to purchase agricultural supplies that could help her increase her economic activity and her familys quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase agricultural supplies

loan.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es: La seora Mara Alejandra a sus 27 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de helado, snakcs y dulces; debido al invierno presentado en la regin, ella desea diversificar su negocio y vender adicionalmente comidas rpidas. Este trabajo lo inicio con el fin de generar mayores ingresos y estar ms tiempo con su hija de 8 aos. La seora Mara Alejandra cuenta con el apoyo de su abuela y una ta, puesto que el padre de su hija no vive con ella. Actualmente, La seora Mara Alejandra desea comprar un carro para comidas rpidas y surtido como panes, carnes, salsas y platos desechables. Con esta nueva variedad de producto en su negocio, la seora Mara Alejandra podr incrementar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su hija. A futuro la seora Mara Alejandra desea tener su propia casa y sacar adelante a su pequea hija.
texts.en: Maria Alejandra, age 27, makes a living out of selling ice cream, snacks and candies. Because of the cold, rainy season that affects her region, she wishes to diversify her business by adding fast food. She started this business in order to generate a greater income and spend more time with her 8-year-old daughter. Maria Alejandra receives support from her grandmother and aunt because the father of her child does not live with them. At present, she wants to purchase a fast food cart and related items such as bread, meats, sauces and disposable plates. By adding this product to her business, she will be able to increase her income and thus to improve the quality of life of herself and her daughter. In the future, Maria Alejandra would like to own a house and help her young daughter get through in life.

loan.use: to purchase a fast food cart and items such as bread, meats and sauces

loan.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro de 30 aos, es un hombre ejemplar. Vive en compaa de Maribel, su esposa desde hace 4 aos. Ambos tienen una hija, Yerali, a la que quieren con mucho amor y cario en una casa alquilada en el casero de Acolla. Para el bienestar de su familia, comenz a trabajar en la ciudad de Huancavelica, donde es docente de educacin secundaria, ah obtiene un salario mensual de parte del estado peruano. Cada 15 das visita su casa, para cuidar de su esposa e hija, tambin para ver sus cultivos de papa y habas que siembra en terrenos alquilados y propios pero en menor cantidad. Adems cuenta con animales como vacas de raza y varias ovejas; que enseba para luego venderlos a un mayor precio en la feria de la ciudad de Jauja que se realiza una vez por semana. Ahora planean ahorrar ms dinero, pues quieren comprarse una casa propia. l pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadora y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Pedro de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales, entre ellos ovejas de raza Junn, para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en: Pedro, age 30, is a desirable model of a man. He lives with his wife Maribel, to whom he has been married for 4 years. They have a daughter called Yerali. They both love her deeply and care for her in a rented house in Acolla village. With his family welfare in mind, he took a job in Huancavelica City as a high school teacher. He receives a monthly wage from the Peruvian public sector. Every two weeks Pedro visits his house to take care of his wife and daughter, as well of his potato and fava bean plantations, which he has at rented plots, and also in some smaller plots of his own. Moreover, he has some animals such as cows and sheep, which he raises and then sales at a higher price at the Jauja citys fair, organized once a week. He and his wife now plan to save more money because they want to buy a house. Pedro belongs to Mujeres luchadoras Community Bank and this is his third loan with our institution. He counts on your support to achieve his goals. Also, he promises to pay back on time because his community bank is made up of responsible and supportive members. If Pedro gets this loan, he will invest in the purchase of livestock such as Junin sheep, which will help him stock his business.

loan.use: to purchase sheep

loan.name: Flor Del Bosque Group

texts.es: El grupo Flor del Bosque est conformado por tres personas trabajadoras una de ellas es Johana de los ngeles quien se dedica a la venta de cosmticos, ropa y perfumes desde hace 5 aos. Ella invertir el crdito en mercadera en especial cosmticos y perfumes. Las otras integrantes son Isaura del Carmen quien tiene una tortillera desde hace 3 aos y Pedro es propietario de una fritanga, restaurante popular que consiste en comida frita.
texts.en: The "Flor del Bosque" group consists of three hard working people. One of them is Johana de los ngeles who has been making a living selling cosmetics, clothing and perfumes for the last 5 years. She will invest the money from this loan in cosmetic products and perfumes. The other members are Isaura del Carmen, who has owned a tortilla bakery for the last 3 years, and Pedro is the owner of a "fritanga", a popular restaurant that specializes in fried food.

loan.use: To purchase cosmetic products and perfumes.

loan.name: Shiphra Group

texts.fr:
Mme LAMOUSSA est la reprsentante du groupe SHIPHRA. Elle est marie et mre de 02 enfants. Le plus g a 05ans et le moins g a 02ans. Personne ne va lcole. Elle a 05 personnes en charge.
Elle vend des pagnes et des tenues pour bb depuis 04ans. Elle sapprovisionne au march du secteur 10 et au grand march en ville .Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes.
Elle veut sacheter 10 pices de pagnes et 03 douzaines de tenues pour bb.
Elle utilise ses bnfices pour assurer ses charges. Elle ambitionne construire une grande boutique pour son activit et aider son mari dans les charges familiales.
texts.en:
Ms. Lamoussa is the leader of the Shiphra group. She is married and has two children. The older child is 5 years old and the younger is 2. Neither of them attend school. She has five people total in her care.
She has sold pagnes (brightly printed West African clothing) and baby outfits for four years. She gets her supplies at the market in sector 10 and at the grand market in the city. Her customers are men and women.
She wants to buy 10 sets of pagnes and three dozen baby outfits.
She uses her profits to pay for her expenses. Her ambition is to build a large shop for her business and to help her husband with the household expenses.

loan.use: To buy 10 sets of pagnes (brightly printed West African clothing) and three dozen baby outfits.

loan.name: Norka Irasema

texts.es:
Norka Irasema naci en la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado y ahora vive en la ciudad D. Cusco. Norka Irasema tiene 27 aos de edad y es soltera. Norka Irasema desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y econmicas en la ciudad D. Cusco.
Norka Irasema se dedica a la venta de ropa, ella compra su mercadera de diferentes ciudades como por ejemplo de Tacna y Lima y despus los vende o distribuye en la ciudad D. Cusco a sus amigos, a familiares, a compaeros de estudio y a otras personas. A Norka Irasema su pequeo negocio no le quita mucho tiempo pues el tiempo restante lo emplea para estudiar la carrera profesional de contabilidad de una de las universidades particulares de la ciudad D. Cusco y ya est cursando el tercer semestre.
Norka Irasema pertenece al banco comunal ahupacman Purisun de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad D. Cusco y en esta oportunidad requiere Norka Irasema el prstamo para comprar ropa.
Norka Irasema se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Norka Irasema was born in Puerto Maldonado and now lives in Cusco. She is 27 years old and single. Norka carries out her daily economic activities in Cusco, making her living selling clothing.
She buys her merchandise from different cities such as Tacna and Lima and then sells or distributes them in Cusco to her friends and family, her classmates and others. Norka's small business doesn't take away too much time from her schedule, as she uses her remaining time studying accounting at one of Cusco's universities. She is already in her third semester.
Norka Irasema belongs to the local bank "ahupacman Purisun" of the Cusco Aririwa Association and at this time she needs the loan to purchase clothing. Norka is thankful for the opportunity offered to her through this channel, and in turn is committed to fulfilling her obligations and the timetable to which they correspond.

loan.use: to purchase clothing.

loan.name: Canastitos Group

texts.es: El grupo los Canastitos est conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Rosa Adela quien vende frituras (papas, yuquitas, enchiladas, platanitos). Este negocio lo inicio hace 8 aos en el mercado ms gran de Nicaragua. Ella invertir en materia prima pltanos, aceite, bolsasetc. Las otras integrantes son Maribel del Socorro quien se dedica a la elaboracin de canastos de bamb y Kenia Myela quien vende pan (bonetes, francs, picos, de queso, molde) en un mercado de Managua.
texts.en: The Canastitos Group is comprised of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of the group members is Rosa Adela who sells fried foods (potatoes, yucca balls, enchiladas, plantains). She started this business 8 years ago in Nicaragua's biggest market. She will invest in basic materials such as plantains, oil, bags...etc. The other group member are Maribel del Socorro who makes a living making bamboo baskets and Kenia Myela who sells bread (French bread, cheese bread, and various sweet dessert breads) in a market in Managua.

loan.use: to buy basic materials such as plantains, oil and bags.

loan.name: Rebeca

texts.es: Rebeca, de 48 aos es una mujer admirable. Ella tiene 4 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Ella es una mujer ocupada, todas las maanas se dirige a sus cultivos de papa y maz, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero hasta el ltimo rayo del sol. Pues cuenta con 5 parcelas de terreno productivo, ella tiene que cuidar de sus sembros sola. Hay das en los que contrata peones, pero son eventuales y la mayor parte solo lo realiza para cosechas. Adems cuenta con gallinas y 60 cuyes de los cuales saca mucho provecho. Cuenta que los mata y vende su carne al menudeo en el mercado de Jauja y en las ferias que se realiza los das sbados. Ahora desea aumentar sus cultivos, pues quiere aprovechar la temporada de lluvias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Rebeca de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Rebeca is an admirable 48 year old woman. She has 4 children, but only lives with 2 of them in her own home located in the small town of Acolla. She is a busy woman, and every morning she heads out to her potato and corn fields, which she tends with great care until the last ray of the sun. She has 5 plots of productive land, and she has to tend her crops alone. There are days in which she contracts day laborers, but it is temporary help and the majority of the time she only does this during harvests. She also has chickens and 60 guinea pigs from which she earns a good profit. She kills them and sells the meat wholesale at the Jauja market and at the farmer's markets occurring each Saturday.
Now she wishes to increase her capacity to grow crops, and wants to take advantage of the rainy season. She belongs to the local bank "mujeres luchadoras" and this is her first loan with MFP, in which she is hoping for support in order to achieve her goal. She also promises to be punctual with the payment of her financial obligations, as her association is comprised of responsible and unified people. Upon receiving this support, Rebeca will invest the requested money in the purchase of natural fertilizers which she will distribute among her potato crops.

loan.use: To buy bags of natural fertilizer.

loan.name: La Amistad Group

texts.es: La Amistad est integrado por 13 amigas y vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, es por ello justamente que lleva ese nombre. Todas ellas estn con ansias de progreso y de salir adelante, pues son mujeres jefas de familia que son muy sacrificadas y luchadoras. Una de esas mujeres trabajadoras es Gloria, quien se dedica al reciclaje de productos, como ser botellas, cartones, y dems tipos de materiales reciclables. Ella se define como una mujer muy sacrificada, ya que ella se esfuerza mucho por ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Gloria trabaja todos los das recolectando los materiales que vende. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de materiales reciclables, que luego vender en cantidad y con lo cual obtendr mayores ventajas.
texts.en:
"La Amistad" ("Friendship") is made up of 13 friends and neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso; this is exactly why they gave their group this name. All these women are anxious to make progress and get ahead, since they are very enterprising, self-sacrificing heads of household.
One of these hardworking women is Gloria, who recycles products like bottles, cardboard and other types of recyclable materials. She defines herself as a very self-sacrificing woman because she tries very hard to help her family through her work. Gloria works everyday collecting the materials that she sells.
She is asking for the loan to buy recyclable materials that she will later resell to gain more benefits.

loan.use: to buy materials for resale.

loan.name: Cheikh Ibrahima

texts.fr: Monsieur Cheikh vit au Sngal. Il est g de 28 ans. Cest un tailleur clibataire qui volue dans le secteur de la couture depuis 1992. Cest une activit quil a opt par amour et par vocation. Il est membre dun guichet des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis septembre 2007. Il sollicite un crdit de 100 000 frs prvu pour lachat de tissus quil va confectionner pour les vendre. Ses bnfices lui permettront de pouvoir sautofinancer dans lavenir. Le dveloppement de son activit lui permet de multiplier ses ateliers de couture.
texts.en: Mr. Cheikh is a 28-year-old, single man who lives in Senegal. A tailor by trade, he has been working in this industry since 1992. He chose this activity out of love and thinks of it as his calling. He became a member of a U-IMCEC branch in September 2007. He is seeking a loan of 100,000 francs to buy fabrics to make clothes for sale. The profits will allow him to self-finance in the future, and the expansion of his business will help him to set up additional sewing shops.

loan.use: to buy fabrics to make clothes for sale

loan.name: Artemio

texts.es: Artemio, de 45 aos, es un hombre responsable. Vive en compaa de Palmer, su esposa desde hace 18 aos. Ambos tienen 5 hijos menores a los cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Desde hace 18 aos viene sembrando productos alimenticios como cereales, tubrculos y verduras. Los cuales cuida con mucho esmero. Su especialidad es la espinaca, el nabo y las alverjas; cuenta que en temporadas de cosecha los comerciantes mayoristas le pagan muy bien sus alimentos en el mercado de la ciudad de Jauja, donde visita con frecuencia ya que es el nico. Adems tiene vacas, toros pequeos y ovejas que vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad econmica. Ahora trabajan con mucho ahnco, l y su esposa; pues desean comprarse un terreno propio y de esa manera minimizar los gastos de arriendo. l pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Artemio de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembros de papa y habas.
texts.en:
