Artemio, 45, is a responsible man. He lives with Palmer, his wife of 18 years. Together they have five minor children for whom they care in their own home, located in the community of Acolla.
For 18 years he has been growing food products such as cereals, tubers, and vegetables, which he takes care of with great dedication. His specialty is spinach, rutabaga, and peas. He says that during the harvest season the wholesale vendors pay him very well for his food in the market of the city of Jauja, which he visits frequently because it is the only one. He also has cows, small bulls, and sheep that he sells when he has some financial necessity.
Now he and his wife are working very hard because they want to buy themselves their own piece of land to minimize the expenses of renting.
He belongs to Mujeres Luchadoras Communal Bank, and this is his third loan with MFP. He hopes for the support of all of you to realize his objective. He also promises to be punctual with his payments, since the members of his bank are responsible and supportive people.
When Artemio receives his support he will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizer to spread on his potato and bean crops.

loan.use: to buy bags of natural fertilizer.

loan.name: Sadith Esther

texts.es: Sadith se dedica a la fabricacin de productos artesanales como manillas, tejidos, pedrera entre otras manualidades, que ofrece a sus clientes en un punto de venta. Sus principales materias primas son el coco, las semillas, los hilos, y el totumo, un fruto que crece en Colombia, es de fuerte corteza que se endurece cuando est maduro. Su arte forma parte de una tradicin, usada en la poca precolombina, cuando los indgenas mocans que habitaron el centro y sur del Atlntico, utilizaban esta corteza para hacer vasijas -llamadas totumas- y cantimploras en las que almacenaban leche y agua y para uso decorativo como lo hace Sadith. Desde el ao 2004 cuando estudiaba su bachillerato, su cnyuge le ense este oficio, en la actualidad ambos trabajan en su punto de ventas, ubicado en una esquina muy concurrida, y cerca de un centro comercial, lo cual hace posible que sus ventas cada da aumenten mas, por eso trabajan sin descanso de lunes a domingo de 10:00 a m a 9:00 p.m. Su competencia es alta pero tiene un buen surtido y esto es justamente lo que atrae a sus clientes, adems de su buen trato con ellos. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer credikiva y tambin primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar, hilos, piedras, acero, totumos semillas, al por mayor y de contado, con lo cual obtendr muchos descuentos por volumen de compra y por hacerlo de contado.
texts.en:
Sadith makes crafts such as bracelets, weavings, and the other handicrafts that she sells to customers at her stand. Her main raw materials are coconuts, seeds, thread and totumos, a fruit that grows in Colombia with a tough peel that hardens when it's ripe.
Her art is part of a tradition, dating from the pre-Columbian era. The indigenous Mocans who inhabited the central and Atlantic south parts of the country, used these gourds to make dishes called totumas, canteens in which they stored milk and water, and for decorative purposes, as Sadith does.
Since 2004, when she was studying for her diploma, her partner taught her this skill. Currently both work at her stand, located at a busy corner near a shopping mall, which enables her to increase her sales every day. That's why she works tirelessly from Monday to Sunday, from 10:00am to 9:00pm.
Her competition is intense, but she has a good stock, and this is precisely what attracts her customers; besides how well she treats them. At present, she is applying for her first Credikiva, which is also her first loan from the Fundacin Santo Domingo. With the money, she will buy thread, stones, metal, totumos and seeds at wholesale, for cash, so that she gets a lot of discounts for volume purchase and for paying cash.

loan.use: To buy threads, stones, steel, totumos, and seeds at wholesale, for cash.

loan.name: Maria Asenet

texts.es: La seora Mara Asenet a sus 47 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y accesorios para mujer desde la sala de belleza donde trabaja. La seora Mara Asenet desea comprar mercanca para atender la demanda de fin de ao de sus clientes, lo anterior le permitir aumentar sus ingresos y as mejorar su calidad de vida. A futuro desea tener su propio almacn.
texts.en:
Mara Asenet is 47, and sells beauty products and women's accessories from the beauty salon where she works.
Mara Asenet wishes to buy merchandise to meet year-end demand from her customers. This will allow her to increase her income, and so improve her quality of life.
In the future she wants to have her own store.

loan.use: To buy merchandise such as body lotions, body creams, and hair dye.

loan.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 46 aos es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compaa de sus 5 hijos a los que cuida sola en su casa propia ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Ella es una mujer con mltiples oficios, pues tiene que salir adelante para cuidar de sus hijos. Durante las maanas se dedica a la venta de dulces y comida en un pequeo restaurante que puso en el interior de la escuela de su localidad, ah obtiene un dinero considerable, ya que es la nica que vende estos alimentos. Adems de sembrar papa, trigo, quinua y habas, los cuales cuida en sus terrenos propios, que le fueron heredados por parte de su padre. Tambin cuida de sus animales como gallinas y cerdos que comercializa en la ciudad de Jauja, en la feria que se realiza una vez a la semana. Pero como es conocida, cuenta que en la cosecha de alimentos; los mismos comerciantes visitan sus terrenos productivos para comprar en su totalidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Elizabeth, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 46, and an unassuming woman. She lives with her five children, who she looks after by herself in her own house, located in the settlement of Acolla.
She is a woman with many trades, as she has to get ahead to look after her children. In the mornings, she sells candy and meals in a small restaurant that she has set up inside the local school. There she earns a good amount of money, as she is the only one selling this food.
In addition, she grows potatoes, wheat, quinoa and lima beans, which she looks after on her own land that she inherited from her father. She also looks after her animals, such as chickens and pigs that she sells in the city of Jauja, in the market that is held once a week. But as she is well known, she says that during the harvest, the same merchants visit her productive lands to buy all of her crop.
She belongs to the "Mujeres Luchadoras" communal bank, and this is her third loan with MFP. She hopes that all of you will support her in meeting her goal. In addition, she promises to make her payments on time, as her group is made up of responsible and supportive people.
When she receives her loan, Elizabeth willl use the money to buy natural fertilizers to spread among her potato plants.

loan.use: To buy sacks of natural fertilizer.

loan.name: Jn 3:16 Group

texts.es: El grupo JN 3:16 est conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es la seora Josefa quien tiene una pequea panadera la cual inicio hace un ao. Ella invertir el crdito en harina, aceite, pasteleado, queso, leaetc. Las otras integrantes son Raquel quien se dedica a la venta de plantas desde hace 5 aos y Claudia comerciante de ropa usada y nueva desde hace 3 aos.
texts.en:
The group JN 3:16 is made up of three hardworking women. One of them is Josefa, who has a small bakery which she opened a year ago. She will use the loan for flour, oil, baking materials, cheese, firewood, etc.
The other members are Raquel, who has made a living selling plants for five years, and Claudia, who has been a new and used clothing salesperson for three years.

loan.use: to buy flour, oil, cheese and firewood.

loan.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan naci en la ciudad de Paucartambo y ahora vive en la ciudad del Cusco. Juan tiene 42 aos de edad y es casado y fruto de esta unin tiene dos hijos. Juan desarrolla sus actividades cotidianas y econmicas en la ciudad del Cusco.
Juan se dedica a la crianza de cuyes y tambin a la capacitacin de crianza de animales menores. Ya son varios aos que se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y le va mu bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
Juan pertenece al banco comunal ahupacman Purisun de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y en esta oportunidad requiere Juan el prstamo para comprar ms cuyes.
Juan se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Juan was born in the city of Paucartambo and now lives in Cusco. He is 42 years old, married, and has two children. Juan performs his daily economic activities in Cusco.
Juan makes a living raising guinea pigs and also training how to raise young animals. He has been raising animals for several years now and it's going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his work.
Juan belongs to the communal bank ahupacman Purisun of the Arariwa Association of Cusco. With this opportunity at hand he requests the loan to buy more guinea pigs.
Juan is thankful for the opportunity given to him by this means and also commits himself to honor the scheduled payments.

loan.use: to buy more guinea pigs.

loan.name: Monica Cecilia

texts.es: Monica, es una Madre Soltera de 41 aos de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad que cursan el nivel secundario, ella dedica a brindar el servicio de comida rpida ya que desde muy pequea vea a su madre cocinar es por eso que ella eligio este oficio y porque le parece que este negocio es rentable. Monica vive y trabaja en Ica, Per. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco. In this hot, arid climate we find the client's home and business. Monica es una mujer ejemplar, luchadora, trabajadora y muy responsable con muchas ganas de sacar adelante a su familia, pese al desafi por la falta del padre de sus hijos Monica brinda este servicio de comida rpida (salchipapas, salchipollo, hamburguesas, etc) desde en el ao 2006 , gana semanalmente un promedio de S/ 210 nuevos soles. Con el prstamo de S/. 2000 soles que recibir gracias a KIVA, Monica invertir este crdito para la compra de insumos (papa, lechuga, etc),. El sueo de la seora Monica es tener su propia casa en donde sus hijos estn cmodos y seguros para que as puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y hacer crecer su negocio para que en futuro llegue a ser una gran empresaria , su asesor cree es que una excelente cliente y que pagara sus cuotas puntualmente .
texts.en: Monica is a 41-year-old single mother. She has two dependent children who are in secondary school. Monica's business is providing a fast food service. She chose this trade as she used to watch her mother cook from a very young age. In addition, she believes that it is a profitable business. Monica lives and works in Ica, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert, about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital. It is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peru's traditional national drink, Pisco. In this hot, arid climate we find the client's home and business. Monica is an exemplary, tenacious, hard-working and very responsible woman who has a great desire to get her family ahead in life, despite the challenge presented by the absence of the children's father. Monica has been providing her fast food service since 2006. She makes salchipapas (shredded sausage and fries), salchipollo (shredded chicken and fries), hamburgers etc. She earns, on average, 210 soles a week. With the loan for 2,000 soles that she will receive thanks to Kiva, Monica will invest in buying supplies (potatoes, lettuce, etc.). Monica's dream is to own her own home where her children are comfortable and safe and can enjoy a better quality of life. She would also like to grow her business so that, in the future, she becomes a big businesswoman. Her loan officer believes her to be an excellent client who will make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy supplies (potatoes, lettuce, bread, etc.)

loan.name: Ayo Ayo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. AYO AYO iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Patacamaya, est compuesta por nueve integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la seora Luisa es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de verduras, venta de lubricantes, panadera, venta de tarjetas TIGO, venta de ganado, tienda de barrio.
La seora Luisa indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de panadera que viene trabajando hace aos atrs, aprendiendo el mismo de su esposo.
El prstamo que sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de harina) que adquirir de las Ferias y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender en su comunidad. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitacin en crdito gil, la capacitacin en salud y el seguro.
texts.en:
The communal association Ayo Ayo will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the focal center Patacamaya. It's made up of nine members and is led by a board whose president is Luisa. The business that the members of the communal association advance are varied. Between them there is: vegetable sales, lubricant sales, a bakery, TIGO card sales, livestock sales, and a neighborhood store.
Luisa indicates that this is the first time that she's working with Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution after being invited by a promoter. Currently she has a bakery business that she's had for years, and which she learned from her husband.
She will take out a loan to raise her capital (buying flour) which she will obtain from the market and subsequently will sell in her community after baking. This kind of work allows her to generate resources with which to support her family since she cohabits and has two children.
When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the loan and health trainings and the insurance.

loan.use: to buy flour.

loan.name: Mara Lourdes

texts.es: La seora Mara Lourdes es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora en 1993 inicio su pequeo negocio con la venta de chiveras poco a poco fue aumentndola hasta tener una pulpera bien surtida. Ella invertir el crdito en granos bsicos, carne, comida para perroetc. ya que desea tener una miscelnea.
texts.en:
Mara Lourdes is a hardworking, entrepreneurial woman. In 1993 she began her small business selling dairy products. Little by little she increased her sales until she had her own well-stocked grocery store.
She will invest her loan in buying basic grains, meat, dog food, etc.as she wishes to have a variety of things to sell.

loan.use: to buy merchandise, especially basic grains, meat, etc.

loan.name: Lucrecia Evangelina

texts.es: La seora Lucrecia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien inicio hace 6 aos su pequeo y modesto taller de costura y bordados cotonas, trajes y blusas entre otros. Ella invertir el crdito en materia prima manta, crochet, accesorios, adornosetc.
texts.en: Lucrecia is a hardworking, entrepreneurial woman who began her small and modest sewing workshop (embroidery, cotton shirts, suits, blouses, etc.) 6 years ago. She will invest the loan in raw material, crochet, accessories, decorations, etc.

loan.use: to buy fabric, thread, etc.

loan.name: Maria Edilma

texts.es: La seora Mara Edilma a sus 55 aos de edad, es madre de un hijo de 22 aos de edad. La seora Mara Edilma se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir a terceros desde hace 10 aos, su trabajo lo realiza con mucho amor y es muy comprometida con su hijo y su familia. La seora Mara Edilma desea comprar insumos para su taller de confeccin como telas, hijos y moldes, con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos y poder adems entregar a tiempo los pedidos de la temporada de fin de ao. A futuro desea tener ms grande su taller de confeccin y as generar ms empleos directos en su comunidad.
texts.en: Mara Edilma is 55 years old and mother of a 22 year-old son. She has made a living tailoring third party clothing for 10 years. She does her work with love and is very committed to her son and family. Mara Edilma would like to buy supplies for her tailor workshop such as cloth, thread, and patterns with the end goal of increasing her income and being able to complete her end-of-year seasonal orders on time. In the future she hopes to have a bigger tailor workshop and thus create more direct jobs in her community.

loan.use: to buy supplies like cloth, thread, and patterns.

loan.name: Helena

texts.es:
Helena es socia del Banco Comunal Kapia Marca del distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 48 aos D. edad, es viuda y tiene cuatro hijos, dos independientes.
Hace seis aos que trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R., su primer prstamo fue por la suma D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio D. venta D. golosinas, artesana y telas.
Solicitar un nuevo prstamo por la suma D. S/. 2,500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertir en la compra D. diez rollos D. telas D. diferentes colores para venderlas en la ciudad D. Arequipa.
Su sueo para el futuro es tener ms capital y tener un puesto donD. pueda captar ms clientes y mejorar sus ganancias.
Lo que ms le gusta D. su Banco Comunal son las bromas D. las socias y la posibilidad D. ahorrar.
texts.en:
Helena is a member of the Kapia Marca communal bank in the district and province of Yunguyo in the Puno department. She is a 48 year old widow. She has four children; two of them are independent.
She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela R. for six years. Her first loan was for 300 soles, which she invested in her business of selling sweets, handicrafts, and fabrics.
She will request a new loan for 2,500 soles in order to buy ten rolls of different colors of fabric to sell in the city of Arequipa.
Her dream for the future is to have more capital, to have a stand where she can get more customers, and to improve her income.
What she likes the most about her communal bank are the jokes from the members and the chance to save.

loan.use: to buy ten rolls of different colors of fabric.

loan.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es: 15 mujeres de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso se unieron con ganas de salir adelante y con un gran espritu de superacin. Todas son muy sacrificadas, luchan para la estabilidad de sus familias, ya que son mujeres jefas de familia, que tienen a su cargo mantener su hogar. Una de las miembros del grupo es la seora Honorina, quien se dedica a la manicura. Ella comenta que tiene mucho trabajo, pues tiene muchos clientes que siempre le solicitan sus servicios. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora, emprendedora y por sobre todo muy luchadora. Ella lucha diariamente por mantener a su familia y darles un mejor estilo de vida. Ella solicita la ayuda de fundacin paraguaya y de kiva para la compra de esmaltes para uas, limas, y dems productos e insumos para su trabajo. Agradece a la fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Fifteen women from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso joined together with the desire to get ahead and with a great spirit of self improvement. They are all very self-sacrificing; they strive for their families stability since they are women heads of household who are charged with supporting their homes.
One of the group members is Honorina who is a manicurist. She comments that she has a lot of work because she has many customers who always seek out her services. She defines herself as a very hardworking, enterprising and, above all, tenacious woman. She strives daily to support her family and give them a better standard of living.
She is asking for help from Fundacin Paraguaya and from Kiva to buy nail polish, emery boards and other products and supplies for her work. She thanks the Fundacin for the opportunity it gives her.

loan.use: to buy manicure supplies.

loan.name: Rosabel

texts.es: Rosabel, de 45 aos es una mujer dulce. Vive en compaa de su hijo menor Jhojan al que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Se siente orgullosa, pues es una mujer como pocas. Cuid de sus 4 hijos sola, ahora se encuentra delicada de salud, pues tuvo un accidente que lastim su rodilla. Su principal actividad econmica es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en un espacio que acondicion en su casa, su tienda es muy surtida, cuenta con dulces, carne y bebidas de toda variedad. Pero como es una mujer del campo, continua sembrando papa, habas, cereales en sus terrenos propios, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero, aunque ya no pueda limpiar por ella misma sus sembros producto de la lesin en la rodilla. Ms se siente feliz de cuidar a sus animales como cerdos, cuyes y gallinas que vende cuando ya estn maduras. Estar en el campo es mi mayor pasatiempo, afirma. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadora y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Rosabel de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de panetones, chocolates, leche y dems productos para su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
Rosabel, 45, is a sweet woman. She lives with her youngest son, Jhohan, who she cares for in her own house located in Acolla hamlet. She feels proud because shes a woman like few others. She raised her four children by herself and now shes a bit ill because she had an accident and injured her knee. Her main economic activity is selling basic staple items in a space she equipped at home; her store is very well-stocked with candy, meat and all sorts of beverages. But being a woman from the countryside, she continues farming potatoes, lima beans and cereals on her land. She cares for the crops with much diligence even though she cant do the weeding herself because of her injured knee. She feels happy too about caring for her animals like pigs, guinea pigs and chickens that she sells when they are mature. Being out in the fields is my best pastime she affirms.
She belongs to the Mujeres Luchadoras communal bank and this is the third MFP loan where shes hoping for support from all of you to reach her objective. She promises to be punctual with her installment payments because her association is composed of responsible, supportive people. If Rosabel were to receive your support, she will use the requested money to buy panettones [traditional Christmas cakes], chocolates, milk and other products for her foodstuffs store.

loan.use: to buy panettones, chocolates and milk.

loan.name: Bacilia Eugenia

texts.es:
Bacilia es socia del Banco Comunal Kapia Marca del distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 44 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 5 hijos, tres de ellos son independientes.
Trabaja desde hace cuatro aos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, este dinero lo invirti en su negocio de venta de productos naturales.
Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 3000.00 nuevo soles, comprar tres cajas de productos naturales de la marca Herbalife como batidos, medicinas naturales, Napol, extracto de sbila, trabaja junto con su esposo y los vende en diferentes lugares como Azngaro, Juliaca, Macusani y Rinconada.
La seora desea tener ms clientes y buen ingreso econmico todos los meses para poder solventar los gastos del hogar.
Lo que ms le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Bacilia is a member of the Kapia Marca communal bank in Yunguyo District and Province, Puno Department. Shes 44 years old, married and has five children three of which are independent already.
Shes worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for four years. Her first, 300 new sol, loan was used to invest in her business selling natural products. She will use this new, 3000 new sol, loan to buy three cases of natural products of the Herbalife brand like blended drinks, natural medicines, Napol, aloe extract. She works with her husband and sells in places like Azngaro, Juliaca, Macusani and Rinconada.
She wants to have more customers and good income every month to cover household expenses. What she most likes about her communal bank is the punctuality.

loan.use: to buy various natural products.

loan.name: Yolima

texts.es: Yolima de 25 aos de edad vive en un barrio muy tradicional en la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cnyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 2 y 5 aos. All en el patio de su casa se dedica a la fabricacin de camas de madera, negocio que desde hace 2 aos es de su propiedad pues lo compr a su madre, quien no dispona de capital y Yolima como tena sus propios ahorros logr adquirirlo, sus principales clientes son los almacenes ubicados en el centro de la ciudad, quienes le compran mediante el sistema de crditos y por encargos. Su meta ms adelante es lograr organizarlo, generar empleos mediante su crecimiento. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer credikiva, tambin primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar madera variada, triplex, pintura e insumos para fabricar nuevos diseos que se encuentran encargados, para la poca de gran movimiento comercial en el pas: el mes de Diciembre. Su inversin planea ser exitosa, porque la hace sobre encargos y especialmente porque hay mucho efectivo disponible en el ambiente comercial, porque los trabajadores tienen en sus manos las primas, bonificaciones, con las que pueden hacer las compras, que usualmente durante otra poca no es muy probable lograrlas.
texts.en:
Yolima, 25, lives in a very traditional neighborhood in the city of Barranquilla with her spouse and two children who are 2 and 5 years old. She manufactures wood beds there in her yard, a business shes had for two years having purchased it from her mother who needed capital. Yolima had some savings so she acquired it. Her main customers are stores located downtown who buy from her on credit and on order. Her goal for later on is to organize it and generate employment through growth.
She is currently applying for her first Kiva loan as well as her first Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo financing that shell use to buy assorted lumber, plywood, paint and supplies to manufacture new designs she has on order for the season of great commercial activity in the country: the month of December.
Her investment looks to be successful because she works based on prior orders and because there is quite a bit of cash flowing in the commercial environment because employees have available their bonuses and allowances that they can use to make purchases which during other times of the year wouldnt be probable.

loan.use: to buy assorted lumber, plywood, paint and supplies.

loan.name: Las Recicladoras Group

texts.es: En la ciudad D. Asuncin. 15 mujeres se han unido con ganas D. salir adelante y por medio D. su trabajo en conjunto poder salir adelante. La mayora D. estas mujeres son madres D. familia y jefas D. hogar por lo que da a da se sacrifican por sus familias. Este comit se encuentra en su tercer ciclo en donD. se pueD. destacar el sentido D. responsabilidad y los deseos D. progresar que tienen D. cada una D. ellas. Una D. estas mujeres es la seora Fernanda, quien se dedica al reciclaje D. todo tipo D. productos, como ser botellas, cartones, papeles y dems tipo D. artculos. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado, puesto que es muy duro para ella tener que recorrer diariamente en busca D. plstico. Nos cuenta que gracias a su sacrificio ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y procurar para que no les falte nada. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. materiales D. reciclaje, como ser D. botellas, aluminio y dems, lo cual ella vuelve a vender y esto le produce un poco ms D. ganancias. Agradece a la fundacin por la gran oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
In the city of Asuncin, 15 women have joined together with the wish to get ahead through their work as a group to be able to get ahead. Most of these women are mothers and heads of household who day by day sacrifice for their families. This committee is in its third cycle and the sense of responsibility and the wish to make progress each one of them has stand out.
One of the members is Fernanda who recycles all sorts of products like bottles, cardboard, paper and other types of items. She comments that the work is very demanding because its difficult for her to have to go out daily in search of plastic. She tells us that thanks to her sacrifice shes managed to raise her family and see that they lack nothing.
She requests the loan to buy recyclables like bottles, aluminum and others that she then resells producing a bit of profit. She thanks the Fundacin for the great opportunity it gives her.

loan.use: to buy bottles, aluminum and others to resell to recyclers.

loan.name: Maria Fabiola

texts.es: La seora Mara Fabiola a sus 56 aos de edad se dedica desde hace ocho aos a su negocio, una tienda ubicada en el centro de la ciudad de Medelln. La tienda inicialmente era de su esposo, quien falleci y por tanto la seora Mara Fabiola quedo con la responsabilidad de la tienda y de su familia. Con la tienda a sacado adelante a su familia. La seora Mara Fabiola desea comprar surtido como snakcs, dulces, galletas, aceite, caf, entre otros productos, lo anterior le permitir aumentar sus ingresos con los cuales pueda brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mara Fabiola, 56, has been in business for 8 years; she runs a store located in downtown Medelln. The store initially was her husbands but when he died Mara Fabiola was left with the responsibility of the store and her family. The store has made it possible for her to support her family. Mara Fabiola would like to buy more stock merchandise like snacks, candy, cookies, oil and coffee, among other products which will allow her to increase income to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Municipal D-4 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. MUNICIPAL D-4 iniciar su dos ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Julia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cereales, venta de cosmticos, venta de comida, tejido de mantas, comercio de papa y arroz, elaboracin de calzados, librera, costura.
La seora Julia, indica que hace dos aos que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta y elaboracin de comida que viene trabajando hace aos atrs, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de viveres) que adquirir de la Ceja y posteriormente lo vender en su puesto comercial. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cinco hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitacin.
texts.en:
The Municipal D-4 communal bank will start its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes focal center. It has 8 members led by a governing board headed by Julia. The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of businesses among which we have: cereal sales, cosmetics sales, food sales, blanket weaving, potato and rice sales, shoe making, stationery shop and sewing.
Julia states that shes worked with Pro Mujer for two years having joined thanks to an invitation from one of the promoters. She currently has a business preparing food that shes had for several years having learned it from her mother.
The loan shell take out now is to increase capital. She will buy foodstuffs in La Ceja which shell later sell in her food stand. This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family since shes married and has five children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers the she likes the training.

loan.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to invest in his own premises

loan.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia, de 39 aos es una mujer como muchas cualidades. Siempre honesta y con una sonrisa en el rostro. Ella tienen 5 hijos pero solo vive con 3 de ellos: Kelvin, Stefany y Deyvis a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Su trabajo le ayud a mantener a sus hijos por si sola. Sus principales cultivos constan de papa, trigo y cebada, los que siembra en terrenos heredados de parte de su padre. Ya tiene 5 aos de experiencia y lo que ms le agrada es ayudar a las personas que la necesitan, ya que en temporada de cosecha contrata peones quienes le ayudan a recolectar los frutos maduros de la tierra. Le gusta el campo por ello hace algunos aos se compr 2 vacas y varias ovejas, que le proporcionan leche y carne para consumo propio. Pero si tiene algn problema financiero, aprovecha y los vende. Ahora ella desea ahorrar lo mximo para brindarles a sus hijos una buena educacin. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Alicia de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de papa y cebolla.
texts.en:
Alicia, 39, is a woman with many qualities. Shes always honest and has a smile on her face. She has five children but only lives with three of them: Kelvin, Stefany and Deyvis that she cares for in her own house located in Acolla hamlet. Her work helped her support her children by herself. Her main crops are potatoes, wheat and barley that she grows on lands inherited from her father. She has five years experience and what she likes best is helping people who need it since during harvest season she hires day laborers who help her collect the ripe fruit from the soil. She likes the countryside and thats why she bought two cows and several sheep a few years ago and that produce milk and meat for her own consumption. If she has a financial problem, though, she can take advantage of them and sell them. She now wants to save up the most possible to provide her children with a good education.
She belongs to the Mujeres Luchadoras communal bank and this is the third MFP loan where she hopes for support from all of you to reach her goal. She promises to be punctual with her payments because her association is composed of responsible, supportive people. If Alicia were to receive your support, she will use the requested money to buy natural fertilizer to spread among her potato and onion crops.

loan.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizer.

loan.name: Tania Frineti

texts.es:
La socia Tania sigue perteneciendo en el banco comunal AHUPACMAN PURISUN de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad D. Cusco.
La socia Tania alterna sus actividades D. hogar con el comercio minorista, ella sigue dedicndose a la compra y vende de ropa de forma independiente, ella en ltimos tiempo a aumentado de clientes pues la mercadera que vende es de calidad y a precios cmodos, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar ms mercadera como por ejemplo pantalones, casacas, polos y otras cosas ms.
La socia Tania agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado mediante este medio y D. mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Tania still belongs to Asociacin Arariwas AHUPACMAN PURISUN communal bank in the city of Cusco. She alternates her household chores with retail. Shes still an independent clothing merchant. Shes increased her customer base lately because the merchandise she sells is of good quality and affordable prices. On this occasion she needs the loan to buy more merchandise like pants, jackets, polo-type shirts and other things, for example.
Tania values and is grateful for the loan granted by this means and commits to make her installment payments according to the established payment schedule.

loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Demetria

texts.es:
Demetria es socia del Banco Comunal Candelaria del centro poblado Poccona, distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 60 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene 5 hijos independientes. Cuenta con estudios D. educacin primaria (incompleta).
Trabaja desD. hace nueve aos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, con su primer prstamo D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio D. compra y venta D. productos D. la regin.
Con ste nuevo prstamo D. S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, comprar 30 arrobas D. habas para tostar y venderlo molido en la localidad D. Yunguyo en las ferias, su esposo le ayuda en le negocio, tambin es agricultor.
Su sueo para el futuro es seguir con el negocio y cada vez mejorar sus ganancias.
Lo que ms le gusta D. su Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Demetria is a member of the Candelaria communal bank in the Poccona settlement, Yunguyo District and Province, Puno Department. Shes 60 years old, married and has five children who are now independent. She attended elementary school but did not complete it.
She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for nine years. She used her first, 300 new sol, loan to invest in her business buying and selling regional products. She will use this new, 500 new sol, loan to buy 30 arrobas of lima beans to roast and sell ground in the Yunguyo markets; her husband who is also a farmer helps her with the business.
Her dream for the future is to stay in business improving her profits every time. What she most likes about her communal bank is the ease of the loan and the savings.

loan.use: to buy thirty arrobas of lima beans.

loan.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El seor Jorge vive en la comunidad de San Francisco en el municipio de Olanchito. Tiene 64 aos de edad y vive con su esposa Reina y sus dos hijas. La pareja tiene 30 aos de casado y sus hijas tiene 16 y 6 aos de edad, las cuales estn estudiando. Ambos padres aportan a los gastos familiares. Jorge se dedica a la agricultura y Reina administra una pulpera.
Don Jorge es muy conocido por sus vecinos como una persona trabajadora y dedicada, buen padre y amigo. Seor Jorge ha sembrado maz por los ltimos 40 aos. Su padre le ense la siembre, el cual ha sido su patrimonio desde siempre. Le gusta la siembre ya que sigue el buen ejemplo de su padre y hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien.
Solicit este crdito de L11,000 para arar su tierra, comprar insumos y pagar sus empleados, ya que est en temporada de siembra. Seor Jorge quiere invertir en su cosecha para aumentar sus ganancias y as poder invertir ms dinero en la pulpera de su esposa.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in the community of San Francisco in Olanchito municipality. Hes 64 years old and lives with his wife, Reina, and their two daughters. The couple has been married 30 years and his daughters are 16 and 6 years old; both are in school. Both parents contribute to household expenses. Jorge is a farmer and Reina runs a grocery store.
Jorge is very well known among his neighbors as a hardworking, dedicated man who is a good father and friend. Jorge has planted corn for the last 40 years. His father taught him how to plant and this has been his estate since forever. He likes farming because he follows his fathers good example and to date has done very well.
He requested this L11,000 loan to till the soil, to buy supplies and to pay his employees since this is planting season. Jorge wants to invest in his crops to increase profits and be able to invest more money in his wifes grocery store.

loan.use: to till the land, to buy supplies and to pay his employees.

loan.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es: El grupo 8 de diciembre es de la ciudad de Lambar, est integrado por 17 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de un barrio muy humilde de esa ciudad. Ellas son muy sacrificadas y trabajadoras, ya que prefieren trabajar de sol a sol para darle lo mejor a sus familias en vez de hacer cosas malas, de las que tengan que avergonzarse. Emilda es una de esas mujeres admirables, ella comenta que se dedica a la venta de leche desde hace ya un buen tiempo, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien formada. Comenta que gracias a la buena calidad de su producto ahora ya es conocida por todo el barrio. Ella desea salir adelante y seguir ayudando a su familia, es por ello de su sacrificio. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de leche en cantidad, con lo cual podr surtirse para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Realmente esta muy agradecida por esta oportunidad que le da la fundacin y kiva.
texts.en: The Group, The 8th of December, is from the city Lambar. It is composed of 17 women, all of them friends and neighbors of a humble neighborhood of that city. They make sacrifices and are very hardworking as they prefer to work from dawn until dusk in order to provide the best for their families instead of doing bad things that they would have to be ashamed of. Emilda is one of these admirable women. She says that she sells milk for a living. Since she has been doing this for some time, she has a well formed clientele. She says that thanks to the good quality of her product, she is now known by everyone in the neighborhood. She wants to move forward and continue helping her family, the reason for her sacrifice. She is requesting a loan to buy milk in bulk, with which she will be able to stock up in order to meet the demands of her clients. She is truly very thankful for this opportunity that the foundation and Kiva is giving her.

loan.use: To buy milk for resale.

loan.name: Liverata

texts.es: Liverata, de 43 aos es una mujer responsable. Vive en compaa de Julin su esposo; ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Sus 2 mayores hijos se dedican trabajan fuera de la ciudad, uno en el pas de Venezuela y el otro en la ciudad de Trujillo al norte del pas. Gracias a su trabaj, saco adelante a sus hijos, de los que se siente orgullosa. Su principal actividad econmica es la agricultura, con la siembra de papa y hortalizas. Las que lleva 19 aos cuidando con mucha sabidura. Cuenta que con el apoyo de su esposo, tambin puede criar animales como ovejas y cerdos que vende junto a su cosecha en la feria que se realiza en la ciudad de Jauja, ah obtienen buenas ganancias, sobre todo porque su esposo aprovecha en sacar una motocarro que tienen para realizar trasporte pblico entre las calles de la ciudad. Ahora ellos desean mejorar sus ingresos para el futuro de sus hijos menores. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadora y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Liverata de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su prxima siembra de habas.
texts.en:
Liverata, age 43, is a very responsible woman. She lives with her husband, Julin. They have five children, but they only live with three of them in their own house in the rural community of Acolla. Their two oldest children work outside of the city. One works in Venezuela, and the other works in the city of Trujillo to the north of the country.
Thanks to her work, she got her children ahead, and she is proud of them. Her main business activity is farming; she grows potatoes and vegetables. She has very astutely been taking care of her crops for 19 years. She says that with her husbands support she is also able to raise animals like sheep and pigs. She sells them together with the harvest at the fair in the city of Jauja. They get good earnings there mainly because her husband makes the most of it by taking his motocarro (three wheeled motorized vehicle) to provide public transportation among the streets of the city.
Now they wish to improve their income for their minor childrens future. She belongs to the Mujeres Luchadora (Tenacious Women) communal bank. This is her third loan with MFP. She hopes for support from all of you to achieve her objective. She pledges to be punctual with her payments. Her association is comprised of responsible and supportive people.
Upon receiving your support she will use the requested money to buy natural fertilizers for her next planting of beans.

loan.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizers.

loan.name: Mara Luzmila

texts.es: La seora Mara Luzmila a sus 54 aos de edad, es madre de cuatro hijos. La seora Mara Luzmila se dedica desde hace dos aos junto con una de sus hijas a la elaboracin y venta de arepas a diferentes clientes como restaurantes, tiendas y cafeteras. La seora Mara Luzmila se vio en la necesidad de crear su propio negocio luego de separarse de su esposo quien la dejo sola con la responsabilidad de su hogar. La seora Mara Luzmila desea comprar maquinaria como una maquina selladora de empaques, camillas de enfriamiento e insumos como el maz. Con lo anterior la seora Mara Luzmila aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y a futuro elaborar otro tipo de arepas como de queso y redondas y posicionar su marca.
texts.en: At age 54, Mara Luzmila is the mother of four children. She and one of her daughters have been making and selling cornmeal rolls to different customers for the past two years; customers like restaurants, stores, and cafeterias. Mara Luzmila saw the need to start her own business after separating from her husband, who left her with the responsibility for the household. She would like to buy machines, such as a branding machine, cooling racks, and ingredients such as dried corn. This will allow her to increase her income and provide a better quality of life for her family. In the future it will also allow her to make other types of rolls, such as cheese rolls and allow her to position her brand.

loan.use: to buy machinery and supplies.

loan.name: Digna Rosario

texts.es:
Digna es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que le gusta salir adelante, ella vive con sus dos hijos en Pimampiro que se encuentra ubicado a 45 minutos de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura en el Norte de Ecuador. Digna trabaja en la crianza y venta de pollos, se dedica a esta actividad gracias a las enseanzas de su madre aprendi desde que era muy pequea, pero ahora ve la necesidad de incrementar el negocio porque tiene que mantener a sus dos hijos y es su nico ingreso econmico.
Es el segundo crdito que realiza a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de pollos y balanceado para la alimentacin de los mismos. Esta inversin le ayudar a Digna a obtener mejores ingresos gracias a las ventas ya que los pollos con buena alimentacin crecern grandes y gordos.
Los sueos que tiene es poder darles el estudio a sus hijos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Digna is a very hardworking person who puts forth a lot of effort and likes to get ahead. She lives with her two children in Pimampiro, located 45 minutes from Ibarra, in the Imbabura province, in the north part of Ecuador.
Digna raises and sells chickens and does this thanks to her mother having taught her when she was very young. Now she sees the need to grow her business because she has to support her two children and this is her only source of income.
This will be her second loan through Fodemi and she will invest the money into chickens and balanced feed. This investment will help her increase her income thanks to better fed and fatter chickens.
Her dream is to provide for her childrens education and improve their quality of life.

loan.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loan.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga es socia del Banco Comunal Candelaria del distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 32 aos de edad, es conviviente y tiene 03 hijos. Cuenta con estudios de educacin primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace dos aos, su primer prstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de compra y venta de productos de la regin.
Su nuevo prstamo ser de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles, prstamo que utilizar para comprar un saco de habas, quinua, chuo, etc. Su esposo le ayuda a tostar los granos y lo vende molido, de esa forma se ayudan mutuamente.
Su sueo para el futuro es tener su casa propia.
Lo que ms le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las charlas respecto al negocio.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the Candelaria communal bank in the Yunguyo district and province, within the Puno department. She is 32 years old, married, and has three children. She has an elementary school education.
Shes been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years and her first loan was for 300 PEN; money that she invested into her business of buying and selling regional products.
She will use the money from this new loan of 1,000 PEN to buy a sack of grapes, quinoa, chuo (freeze-dried potato product), etc. Her husband helps her roast the grains and sells them after grinding. In this way they mutually support one another.
Her dream for the future is for them to have a home of their own.
What she likes most about her communal bank are the business chats.

loan.use: to buy regional products for resale.

loan.name: Geylin Amilcar

texts.es: Geylin, un joven de 23 aos de edad, de oficio agricultor de hortalizas, nacido de Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estel, soltero, el estudio hasta tercer ao de la secundaria no concluyo sus estudios por dedicarse a trabajar en las labores del campo. El inicio en esta actividad por medio de su padre y su hermano mayor, su primer cultivo fue el tomates empez limpiando y preparando el terreno, aprendi a realizar las cercas de madera para proteger la cosecha. Al cumplir 18 aos de edad, sembr su primera cosecha de tomates lo hizo de manera independiente de su padre , adems se dedica a la ganadera el se levanta desde las 4 de la maana a ordear vacas alista su jarra de leche lo coloca a en su carretn prepara su caballo y sale a vender al pueblo su fresca y recin ordeada leche pura. En esto consiste parte de las actividades que el realiza en su vida diaria. El requiere el prstamo para sembrar tomates, comprar insumos, abonos, fertilizantes. Una de sus metas es que desea ampliar su rea de siembra para prepararse en el siguiente ciclo agrcola.
texts.en:
Geylin is 23 years old and works as a farmer. He was born in Pueblo Nuevo in the city of Estel. He is single and has a partial high school education. He was not able to finish school because he had to go to work in the fields.
He started this activity through his father and older brother. His first was a crop of tomatoes. He began by clearing and preparing the land and later learned to build the wooden fences to protect the crop. At 18 he planted his first tomato crop on his own. He also raises livestock.
He gets up at 4:00 am to milk the cows, prepares his milk jug, mounts it on his cart, readies his horse, and goes out to sell fresh milk. These are part of the activities that encompass his daily life.
He needs this loan in order to plant tomatoes, buy supplies, and fertilizers. One of his goals is to expand his planting area to prepare for the next agricultural cycle.

loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Darcy

texts.es:
El socio Darcy sigue participando en el banco comunal AHUPACMAN PURISUN de la Asociacin Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
El socio Darcy sigue vendiendo productos de salud llamados herbalife. El socio Darcy solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de salud y continuar su crecimiento en cuanto llegar a ser uno de los lderes de ventas.
El socio Darcy agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Darcy continues to participate in the AHUPACMAN PURISUN communal bank of the Arariwa Association in Cusco.
He continues to sell Herbalife health products and is asking for this loan in order to invest in health products and continue to grow toward becoming one of the sales leaders.
He is grateful and appreciates the loan he got through this medium. He is committed to making his payments on schedule.

loan.use: to buy more health products.

loan.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: El comit surge gracias a la ayuda que otro comit le haba brindado, pues estas le haban comentado acerca del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundacin paraguaya y ellas con gusto aceptaron formar parte de este proyecto, de lo que surge este grupo llamado Nueva Esperanza, que est integrado por 12 mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, cuya nica ambicin es ayudar a sus familias a tener un mejor porvenir. Una de esas luchadoras es la seora Santa, quien por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia a salir adelente, ya que gracias a eso puede cubrir los gastos que diariamente surgen. Comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir varias, como ser remeras, camisas, pantalones, shorts y dems tipos de prendas. Comenta que le va muy en su negocio y por ello quiere seguir invirtiendo en el y es por ello que solicita el crdito, para la compra de remeras, camisas, shorts, con lo cual podr abastecerse y tener ms variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee grows thanks to help from another committee that told them about the Fundacin Paraguaya program for entrepreneurial women. They were glad to become part of this project and this group, called Nueva Ezperanza (New Hope) was formed. Its made up of 12 hard working women whose only ambition is to help their families have a better future.
Ms. Santa is one of the women who helps her family get ahead through her work, and thanks to this can cover the daily expenses. She says that she sells clothing such as t-shirts, shirts, pants, shorts, and other articles of clothing. She also says that her business is doing well and she wants to continue investing in it, so she is requesting this loan in order to buy clothing to stock up and have a greater variety to offer her customers.

loan.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loan.name: Yeny

texts.es: Yeny, de 32 aos es una mujer sabia. Pues cuida sola de sus 3 hijos: Joselin, Kely y Luis en casa de su pap, ubicada en el casero de Acolla. Su actividad econmica se centra en el campo. La ganadera y agricultura, son sus herramientas para salir adelante, la siembra de papa y habas es su principal cultivo. Ello lo realiza en terrenos que le hered sus padres, donde todas las maanas sale a fertilizar, limpiar y regar; a la espera de la cosecha, ya que es donde obtiene el pago de tantos meses de esfuerzo, pero como es una mujer sabia, tambin cra animales como cerdos y gallinas las que engorda y vende para mantener la estabilidad de su hogar durante todos los meses. Ahora ella desea ahorrar y aperturar el negocio de compra y venta de granos verdes y de esa maner obtener un ingreso extra a su hogar. Ella pertenece al banco comunal mujeres luchadoras y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo integran personas responsables y solidarias. Yeny de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembros y ms animales para su negocio.
texts.en: Yeny is 32 years old and is a very wise woman. She herself cares for her three children, Joselin, Kely, and Luis, in her fathers home located in the Acolla settlement. Her work is in the country, farming and raising livestock. They are her tools for getting ahead. Potatoes and peas are her primary crops, which she raises on land that she inherited from her parents. Every morning she goes out to fertilize, clean up, and water. She later receives her reward for all her months of hard work. Because she is a wise woman, she also raises livestock, such as pigs and chickens, which she fattens up and sells to maintain the stability of the household income every month. Now she wants to save up and expand the business to include buying and selling of basic grains, in order to bring extra income into the household. She is a member of the Mujeres Luchadoras communal bank and this will be their first loan through MFP, where she is counting on your support to help her achieve her goal. She promises to make her payments on time. The group is made up of responsible and united people. She will use the money from this loan to invest in natural fertilizer to spread on her crops. She will also buy animals for her business.

loan.use: to buy fertilizer and animals.

loan.name: Oscar Orlando

texts.es: El seor Oscar Orlando a sus 45 aos de edad, se dedica a la elaboracin y venta de ropa deportiva. Esta labor el seor Oscar Orlando la aprendi desde joven cuando trabajaba para empresas de confeccin. Hoy da, el seor Oscar Orlando tiene su propio taller donde el mismo elabora las prendas desde la compra de la materia prima hasta la comercializacin. El seor Oscar Orlando realiza sus prendas deportivas de acuerdo a la moda y las tendencias del sector. El seor Oscar desea comprar insumos para su taller como lo son telas, hilos y moldes con el fin de incrementar sus ingresos y cumplir con la demanda de fin de ao. El seor Oscar Orlando desea a futuro tener ms grande su taller y as poder emplear a sus vecinos en el taller.
texts.en:
At 45 years old, Oscar Orlando makes and sells sports clothing. He learned this trade when he was young and worked in a clothing factory. Now Oscar Orlando has his own workshop where he works in all stages, from buying the raw materials to marketing. He makes his clothing according the current styles and local tastes.
Oscar Orlando would like to buy supplies for his workshop, such as fabric, thread, and molds, with the intent of increasing his income and keeping up with the end of year demand. In the future he would like to open a bigger workshop and be able to offer jobs to his neighbors.

loan.use: to buy supplies for his workshop.

loan.name: Lydia

texts.es: Lydia, de 49 aos es una mujer responsable. Enviud hace 3 aos, en todo este tiempo tuvo que sacar adelante a 2 de sus 5 hijos: Bryan y Gustavo con los que vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. Todas las maanas ella despierta convencida que tendr un buen da. Pues se dirige a una fuente de soda donde aprende todo lo necesario para poder ella misma abrir uno propio. Su trabajo consiste en elaborar jugos de diferentes frutas, como tambin atender a la clientela que visita el lugar. Cuenta que le pagan un promedio de 20 nuevos soles diarios. Ya por las tardes abre sus puertas para vender los ricos caldos y sustancias que ella sabe preparar con mucha dedicacin, de lunes a domingo sin descanso; los das que vende ms son los fines de semana, por ello no deja de trabajar. Tambin alquila cuartos en su casa, con su ganancia est juntando dinero para abrir un restaurante grande y surtido, donde puede ofrecer toda variedad de comida, sabe que lo conseguir porque ella es una mujer trabajadora. Este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues le agrada pertenecer a una asociacin responsable y solidaria. Lydia de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de sillas y mesas para acondicionar su negocio.
texts.en:
Lydia is 49 years old and is a very responsible woman. She became a widow three years ago and during this time she has had to more two of her five children ahead, Bryan and Gustavo, who live with her in her own home in El Tambo. Every morning she awakens knowing that she will have a good day. She is talking about a soda fountain where she learns everything she needs to know about starting her own. Her work consists of making juices from different fruits and tending to customers. She is paid 20 PEN per day. In the evening she opens to sell the delicious soups and things that she knows how to prepare with much dedication. She works seven days a week without a break. Most of her sales come on weekends, so she keeps working. She also rents out rooms in her home. She is saving her earnings to be able to open a large well stocked restaurant where she can offer a wide variety of food. She knows that she will do it because she is hard working.
This will be her third loan through MFP, where she awaits your support to be able to continue her work. She also promises to make her payments on time and she is happy to belong to such a united and responsible group. She will use the money from this loan to buy tables and chairs for her business.

loan.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loan.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: La Seora Guadalupe es divorciada siempre se ha dedicado al negocio de venta de ropa. Es una mujer emprendedora y responsable, necesita invertir para aprovechar las ventas en poca de navidad y aumentar su clientela y ventas de su negocio. Este negocio es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su negocio es por eso que solicita el prstamo para invertir en el negocio y tener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is divorced and has always been in the clothes selling business. She is a very responsible and enterprising woman and wants to invest in order to take advantage of the Christmas season, increase her business customer base and sales.
This business is her source of income and she is asking for this loan in order to make the investment and increase her income.

loan.use: to buy inventory.

loan.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Norma del Carmen quien se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general. Ella es madre soltera tiene dos hijos. Ella sale a vender su mercadera desde la maana hasta la noche, ella quiere obtener su crdito para aprovechar las ventas navideas y comprar vestido, faldas pantalones, zapatos fajas entre otros. Uno de su mayor desafo es que la compra de lo producto de la alimentacin aumenta diariamente pues tiene que esforzarse para llevar el alimento diario para su familia.
texts.en: Norma del Carmen sells general merchandise for a living. She is a single mother who has two children. She goes out to sell her merchandise from morning until night. She wants to obtain a loan in order to take advantage of the Christmas sales and buy dresses, skirts, pants, shoes, and belts, among other things. One of her major challenges is that the purchase of food products grows daily and she has to strive to bring food daily for her family.

loan.use: to purchase dresses, skirts, pants, shoes, and belts among other things.

loan.name: Isidoro

texts.es: Isidoro emprendedor, trabajador junto a su esposa tiene los planes de mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda. Logro con el prstamo anterior realizar las divisiones de los cuartos y la cocina siendo de gran beneficio para la familia por que tiene mayor privacidad. Con este prstamo comprara materiales de construccin como: Cemento, arena, piedrines, bloques, piedras cantera, estribu, camisa, tablones de maderas, hierro entre otros materiales para la construccin del muro del lado este perimetralmente. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo del mejoramiento de su nivel de vida si como la proteccin que obtendr.
texts.en:
Isidoro is a hard-working entrepreneur. Together with his wife, he has plans to improve the infrastructure of his home. With his previous loan, he managed to install dividing walls between his rooms and his kitchen. This was a great benefit to his family as they now have more privacy.
With this loan, Isidoro will buy building materials such as cement, sand, gravel, blocks, quarry stone, supports, planks of wood, iron and other materials to build a wall on the east-side perimeter of his property. He is grateful to the MFI for the support they are giving him to develop and improve his standard of living. This work will also give him further protection.

loan.use: to buy building materials

loan.name: Basilio Eleodoro

texts.es: Basilio, es un hombre casado de 69 aos de edad, el se dedica a brindar servicios de mecnica automotriz, eligio este tipo de trabajo por vocacin ya que desde muy joven aprendi el arte de planchar el metal de los carros y pintarlos. Basilio es un hombre luchador, trabajador y muy responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante, Basilio brinda este servicios desde el ao 1996 , gana semanalmente un promedio de S/ 390 nuevos soles. Con el prstamo de S/. 2000 soles que recibir gracias a KIVA, Basilio invertir este crdito para la compra de materia prima (carburos, planchas, pinturas, etc) . El sueo del seor Basilio es tener un taller mas sofisticado y con una buena tecnologa para que de este modo pueda atender mejor a sus clientes, y dar un servicio de primera, su asesor cree es que un excelente cliente y que pagara sus cuotas puntualmente . Basilio vive y trabaja en Ica, Per. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco. In this hot, arid climate we find the client's home and business.
texts.en:
Basilio is a married man of 69 years of age. He is a car mechanic and he chose this kind of work as when very young he learned how to panel beat cars and repaint them and developed a vocation for the work.
Basilio is a determined, hardworking and very responsible man with a great desire to get ahead. Basilio has been doing this work since 1996. He earns about S/. 390 nuevos soles (PEN) as week. With the loan of S/. 2000 soles (PEN) which he will receive thanks to Kiva, Basilio will invest this loan in buying raw materials (carbudes, plates, paint, etc). Seor Basilio's dream is to have a more sofisticated workshop with good technology so that he can better attend his customers and give a first class service. His counselor thinks he is an excellent member and will make his repayments punctually.
Basilio lives and works in Ica, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco. In this hot, arid climate we find the member's home and business.

loan.use: to buy raw materials (carbides, plates, etc.)

loan.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: La seora Sandra Patricia a sus 36 aos de edad y madre de un hijo de 10 aos, se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir desde hace nueve aos. Ella trabaja intensamente con el fin de conseguir sus propios ingresos para la manutencin de ella y de su pequeo hijo. La seora Sandra Patricia desea tener una nueva mquina fileteadora con la cual no tenga que subcontratar este servicio. A futuro la seora Sandra Patricia desea tener su taller de confeccin con punto de venta propio y una lnea de propia de ropa femenina, con lo anterior podr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hijo y generar empleos directos.
texts.en:
Sandra Patricia is 36 years old, and she has a ten year old son. She has been making clothes for nine years. She works intensely in order to get her own income to support herself and her small son.
Sandra Patricia wishes to have a new overlock machine. That way she does not have to subcontract for this service.
In the future Sandra Patricia wishes to have a sewing shop with her own place to sell. She also wishes to have her own line of womens clothing. That way she will be able to improve her quality of life and that of her son. She will also be able to generate actual employment opportunities.

loan.use: to purchase a sewing machine to make clothing.

loan.name: Juan Fernando

texts.es: El seor Juan Fernando es padre de familia y tiene dos hijos, el trabaja como jardinero en una casa particular, con este ingreso y a base de mucho esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a su familia. Pero le esta preocupando la seguridad ya que su casa no cuenta con las protecciones en las ventanas y solicita este prstamo para pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar y colocar las protecciones y as su familia va estar mas segura cuando estn en casa.
texts.en:
Juan is a family man and has two children. He works as a gardener at a private house, with this income and a thanks to a lot of effort, he has helped his family to succeed.
But he is worried about safety as his house has no security devices on the windows and he is asking for this loan so he can pay someone to install the necessary protection. His family will then be safer when they are at a home.

loan.use: to buy security devices for the windows and doors of his home.

loan.name: Sugei

texts.es: Sugei de 36 aos de edad es una mujer casada que vive al sur de la ciudad con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 9 y 15 aos. Ella desde hace 8 aos arrend una habitacin a un Bogotano, quien emprendiera una empresa de transporte y le propusiera trabajar con l en este negocio, pues conoca que Sugei se encontraba estudiando mercadeo. Aunque le fue muy bien decidi abandonar esta actividad porque su hijo naci con problemas, pero el propietario del negocio, satisfecho con su trabajo, decidi emprender una sucursal en casa de Sugei, as fu como sugei compr sus equipos, enseres de oficina y se dedic a venderle el servicio de administracin de su empresa de transportes, como hasta la presente y en el cual le ha ido muy bien, pues ha logrado alternarlo con otro de venta de productos, mediante guas especializadas, con el que obtiene buenas ganancias, porque aprovecha el mercado de cada actividad. Su sueo ms adelante es adquirir su propio camin de transporte y hacer su casa de dos pisos, para ampliar el negocio. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer financiamiento con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprar un nuevo computador y variedades de productos que vinieron en sus catlogos con descuentos especiales, con ello logar resultados exitosos porque aprovechar la temporada de Diciembre poca en la cual hay buen movimiento de dinero.
texts.en:
Sugei is a 36 year old married woman who lives in the south of the city with her husband and two children, aged 9 and 15.
For 8 years she has been leasing a room to a man from Bogota, who set up a transport business and suggested she work with him, since he knew that Sugei had been studying marketing. Although it went very well, she decided to give up the work because her son was born with special needs. However, the business owner, pleased with her work, decided to set up a branch in Sugei's home.
This is how Sugei bought her office equipment and started to work providing management services for his transport business, which she still does and has done well in. She now alternates it with selling products, through catalogues, on which she makes a good profit because she makes the most of the market.
Her dream for the future is to buy her own transport lorry and make her house into two flats so she can expand her business.
At the moment, she is applying for her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which she will use to buy a new computer and various catalogue products, at special discounted prices. She will achieve excellent results from these as she will make the most of the December season when there is a lot of money changing hands.

loan.use: to buy a new computer and various catalogue products.

loan.name: Ilci Leojana

texts.es: ILCI: A sus 26 aos, es madre de 2 nios, y una mujer trabajadora, en su domicilio cuenta con un local donde vende ropa americana, cosmticos perfumera etc. Tambin los fines de semana se dedica a la preparacin y venta de tamales, lo cual la hecho conocida y visitada por sus vecinos en su negocio, ella requiere de capital para la compra de ropa de se segunda como suteres, chumpas, chamarras, ya que debido a las grandes lluvias la gente ve la necesidad de abrigarse, sabe que la atencin y la manera con que atiende a las personas que la visitan han sido parte de su crecimiento como pequea negociante, como esposa colabora con sus ingresos al sustento de sus hijos y apoya a su esposo con proyectos que tienen como pareja.
texts.en: Ilci, at her 26 years of age, is a mother of 2 children and a hardworking woman. In part of her house, she has an area where she sells used clothes, cosmetics and perfume, etc. At the weekends she also makes and sells tamales, which have made her popular and well frequented by her neighbours. She needs capital for her business to buy used clothes such as sweaters, jackets and windbreakers as due to the heavy rains people see the need to wrap up. She knows that the attention she pays people and the way she serves those who visit her have been part of her growth as a small busineswoman. As a wife she shares her income to support her children and supports her husband with projects they share as a couple.

loan.use: to buy used clothes.

loan.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es: 11 mujeres D. la ciudad D. Caacup trabajan conjuntamente para obtener mayores ingresos y D. esa forma ayudar a sus familias. Luchan diariamente, pues desean darle a sus familias lo mejor, para que no tengan que pasar por ningn tipo D. necesidades. Una D. ellas es Sustiana, quien se dedica a la venta D. pollos, comenta que le va muy bien en el negocio, por lo que ya se ha formado una buena clientela. Gracias a su trabajo y sacrificio ha logrado salir adelante y cubrir sus gastos bsicos. Ella al igual que sus amigas, integrantes D. comit, desean ayudar a sus familias dndoles una vida digna y decorosa. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. pollos, con lo cual podr abastecerse y cumplir con los pedidos D. su clientela. Agradece a la fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
11 women from the city of Caacup work together to earn a better income to help their families. They fight every day, as they want to give their families the best so that they don't want for anything.
One of them is Sustiana, who sells chickens for a living. She says that her business is going very well as she already has a good customer base.
Thanks to her work and sacrifice, she has been able to support her family and cover their basic expenses. She and her friends, the members of the communal bank, want to help their families and give them a decent life.
She is asking for this loan so she can buy chickens to fulfil her customer's orders. She thanks the foundation for the opportunity it is giving her.

loan.use: to buy chickens to sell on.

loan.name: Yesenia

texts.es:
Yesenia tiene 35 aos de edad y vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada San Carlos, en la segunda provincia de Costa Rica, Alajuela. En una zona donde se ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la produccin de caf y azcar de caa. Produce adems granos bsicos (arroz, frijoles, maz), frutas, legumbres, tubrculos y hortalizas. Y en esta provincia est ubicado el Aeropuerto Internacional Juan Santamara, el ms importante del pas.
Desde hace unos meses que Yesenia necesita un equipo de computo, ya que es madre soltera y se le dificulta sacar adelante a sus hijos, sin esta herramienta tecnolgica.
Es por eso que ella est solicitando un prstamo por el monto de 400,000.00 (cuatrocientos mil colones), esto para la compra de un equipo de computo y asi facilitarles a sus hijos el hacer los trabajos y tareas, para que continen con sus estudios y puedan llegar a ser grandes profesionales.
Yesenia es socia de la Empresa de Crdito Comunal de El Encanto de Pital y es su primer prstamo, en una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 35 years old and lives with her family in a community called San Carlos, in the second province of Costa Rica, Alajuela. The area holds first place nationally in coffee and sugar cane production. In addition the area produces staple food crops (rice, beans, corn), fruits, legumes, root vegetables and other garden produce. Additionally the Aeropuerto Internacional Juan Santamara, the country's most important airport, is located in this province.
Yesenia has needed a computer for several months since she is a single mother and it is difficult to get her children ahead without this technological tool. Thus she is seeking a loan in the amount of 400,000.00 (400 thousand colones) for the purchase of a computer in order to make it easier for her children to do their school work, in hopes that they may continue their studies and one day become great professionals.
Yesenia is a member of the communal bank "El Encanto de Pital" and this is her first loan, in one of the 150 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loan.use: to purchase computer equipment for her children's education.

loan.name: Leobardo

texts.es: El seor Leobardo es padre de familia y le preocupa la seguridad de su familia. Esta solicitando un prstamo para elaborar la barda alrededor de su casa, necesita compara block, cemento, varilla y arena, ya que su papa de dedica a la construccin y le ayudara a realizar la mejora. Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y mejorarle una mejor proteccin.
texts.en:
Leobardo is a father and he worries for his family's safety.
He is requesting a loan to build a wall around his house. He needs to buy cement block, cement, rebar, and sand. His father works in construction and will help him with this improvement.
He wants to improve the quality of life for his family and to improve their protection.

loan.use: to build a wall around his house

loan.name: Isabel Del Carmen

texts.es: Doa Isabel, de 47 aos de edad, originaria de La Concordia municipio de Jinotega, pero vive en el Coyolito comunidad localizada en las afueras de Estel, tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos de ellos son independientes y solo se hace cargo de su hija menor de 15 aos de edad que esta estudiando la secundaria. Adems de ser ama de casa, se dedica a la siembra y comercializacin de hortalizas, lleva 10 aos con esta actividad pero su experiencia en la siembra la adquiri cuando tenan 20 aos de edad sembrando cebolla.
