Actualmente vende su cultivo en la ciudad de Managua. Solicita el prstamo para sembrar 1 manzana de repollo y una manzana de cebolla, compra de insumos, abonos, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra. Con el crdito le ayudara a sacar una produccin de buena calidad. Ya que una de sus metas es vender el producto cancelar el crdito e invertir en comprar 2 vacas paridas para vender leche y preparar a su hija para que logre terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Isabel, 47, is a native of the town of La Concordia in Jinotega, but she lives in El Coyolito, located on the outskirts of Estel. She has three children, two of whom are independent, so she is only in charge of her youngest daughter, age 15, who is studying in high school.
In addition to being a housewife, she works growing and selling vegetables. She has been doing this job for 10 years, but she acquired her experience in planting when she was 20 years old growing onions. Currently she sells her crop in the city of Managua.
She is requesting the loan to plant one "manzana" [7000 square meters] of cabbage and one of onion, to buy supplies and fertilizer, and to pay for labor. The loan will help her get a good-quality crop, since one of her goals is to sell the product, pay back the loan, and invest in buying two calved cows to sell milk and prepare her daughter to finish her studies.

loan.use: to plant cabbage and onion, to buy supplies and fertilizer, and to pay for labor.

loan.name: Corazn De Jess Group

texts.es: Claritza es integrante D. L. Alcanca Comunal Corazn D. Jess grupo conformado por 10 socios dedicados a distintas actividades comerciales. Claritza tiene 38 aos D. edad es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos dependientes en etapa escolar. Motivada por una amiga y con los deseos D. mejorar L. calidad D. vida D. su familia Claritza empez un negocio D. L. venta D. productos D. belleza L. cual lleva 02 aos en dicho rubro, tambin nos manifiesta que trabaja en una panadera embolsando panes D. donD. obtiene un ingreso mas para su hogar. Estas actividades le ha ayudado mucho a Claritza gracias a ello ha logrado unos D. sus sueos comprar su propio terreno, donD. en L. actualidad vive junto a su familia en el distrito D. Matucana- Huarochir. Claritza tiene como meta instalar una tienda donD. pueda brindar productos D. primera necesidad, con los prstamos D. Edaprospo y con mucho esfuerzo lo va a cumplir. En esta oportunidad solicito el prstamo para comprar productos D. belleza como cremas, talcos, colonias, y tambin para mejorar su vivienda por fiestas NaviD.as. L. Alcanca Comunal Corazn D. Jess agradecen el crdito brindado.
texts.en: Claritza is a member of the Corazn D. Jess communal bank, which is composed of 10 members who work in different commercial activities. Claritza is 38 years old, lives with her partner, and has 4 dependent school-aged children. Encouraged by a friend and the desire to improve her familys quality of life, Claritza began a business selling beauty products. She has been doing this for 2 years. She also tells us that she works in a bakery where she bags bread and she has this as another income for her household. These activities have helped Claritza a lot. Thanks to them she has achieved some of her dreams, like buying her own land, where she now lives with her family in the district of Matucana-Huarochir. Claritza has as a goal to open a store where she will proviD. basic products. With the loans from Edaprospo and with a lot of work, she will achieve it. At this time she is requesting a loan to buy beauty products such as creams, powders, colognes, and also to improve her house for the Christmas festivities. The Corazn D. Jess communal bank appreciates the loan provided.

loan.use: to buy beauty products such as creams, powders, and colognes

loan.name: Alba

texts.es: Alba de 52 aos de edad es una mujer casada, que tienen 4 hijos en las edades de 23 a 31 aos y viven en el municipio de Soledad, donde tiene su negocio de vender mercanca variada a crdito y por encargos; negocio que inici hace 3 aos, solamente con la venta de cosmticos, entre sus amigas, familiares y vecinos, construyendo su primera clientela y poco a poco, fue creciendo a travs de los referidos y de agregar cada una de las mercancas que los intereses y necesidades que su clientela sealaba. En la actualidad vende electrodomsticos, calzado, accesorios y mercancas varadas y est solicitando su primer financiamiento con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual planea comprar un surtido de mercancas sobre pedidos, que han hecho sus clientes, porque aprovechar la gran demanda de fin de ao y entre sus metas est el crecimiento de su negocio para continuar fortaleciendo el bienestar familiar.
texts.en:
Alba, 52, is a married woman who has four children from 23 to 31 years of age. They live in the municipality of Soledad where she has her business selling a variety of merchandise on credit and by special order. She began her business three years ago selling only cosmetics among her friends, family members and neighbors, building her first customer base. Little by little she grew by referrals and by adding each of the kinds of merchandise indicated by the interests and needs of her customers. Currently she sells electrical appliances, footwear, accessories and other various merchandise.
She is seeking her first loan with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, with which she plans to buy an assortment of merchandise beyond the orders her customers have placed, in order to take advantage of the big year-end demand. Among her goals is the growth of her business, in order to continue to strengthen the family's well-being.

loan.use: to buy an assortment of merchandise beyond the orders her customers have placed.

loan.name: Enciende Una Luz 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Ramona is a single mother with 4 children who lives in the beautiful town of Samana. This area is a nascent tourist zone, surrounded by the Atlantic ocean and mountains, rivers and natural breezes. Ramona says her most important challenge is to raise her children and guide them in a good way. She enjoys the kitchen and cooking.
Ramona is receiving her second loan from Esperanza Internacional, after having successfully repaid her previous loan. She started her food business 8 months ago with the first loan she took from us. She will use this loan to purchase seafood, meat, chicken and vegetables. With her business profits (for the long term) she will save because she needs to repair her house and make her business prosperous.
Thanks for supporting this group of entrepreneurs!

loan.use: to buy seafood, meat, chicken and vegetables for her food business.

loan.name: Marcelina

texts.es: MARCELINA: Doa Marcelina, es una mujer con el deseo de superarse y sacar adelante a sus 6 hijos aunque solo tenga 2 pequeitos, desde hace 9 aos que su esposo falleci su vida cambio rotundamente, ya que tuvo que velar por sus hijos que gracias a Dios al da de hoy son quienes le brindan un ingreso para sus hermanos pequeos, fue de esta manera en la que ella vio la necesidad de buscar la manera de ganarse un ingreso para sus hijos, empez con la venta de ropa tpica con algunas conocidas quienes la apoyaron, ahora ya logra tener un poco en sus ventas, tambin se dedica a ayudar en oficios domsticos a sus vecinas, siempre al tanto de su pequeo negocio, por lo que requiere de capital para invertir un poco mas en la compra de ropa tipica para la venta ya que le solicitan sus clientes y ella nos tiene ella quiere ver crecer a sus hijos y brindarles todo lo posible para que ellos estudien y se preparen para la vida.
texts.en:
MARCELINA:
Marcelina is a woman who very much wants to improve herself and raise her six children even though just two of them are still little. Nine years ago her husband died and her life changed radically because she had to see after her children. Thanks to God its now they who provide her with income for their little siblings. It was in this way that she saw the need to find a way to earn income for her children. She started selling traditional clothing to some acquaintances that helped her out. She is able now to earn a little from her sales. She also does domestic chores for her neighbors always watching over her small business though. This is why she needs capital to invest a bit more in traditional clothing to sell because her customers request items that she does not have. She wants to see her children grow up and provide them with everything possible so that they can go to school and prepare themselves for life.

loan.use: to buy traditional clothing.

loan.name: Luis

texts.es: El cliente trabaja hace muchos aos como agricultor, como es propietario en el recae la responsabilidad donde se encuentra ubicado en el Sindicato Illimani donde tiene la produccion de platano, citricos y yuca para la produccion y sustento de su familia. Entonces el cliente recurre a para obtener un prestamo el cual invertira en la plantacion de papaya, el cliente es humilde, de sociedad media y persona del lugar con ganas de trabajar y empeoso. El credito le ayudara mucho en el progreso de su familia y desarrollar mas la produccion y su forma de vida ya que tiene que mantener 4 hijos.
texts.en: The client has worked as a farmer for many years. Since hes an owner the responsibility falls on him. Hes located in Sindicato Illimani where he grows banana, citrus fruits, and cassava both to sell and for his familys sustenance. He has come by to request a loan that hell use to pay for his papaya plantation. This loan will help him very much because hes from a humble, middle class family and a person from the location who very much wants to work and is very dedicated since he has to support 4 children.

loan.use: to pay for his papaya plantation

loan.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La seora Rosa Maria es divorciada y tiene dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad, de dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catlogos y trabaja de limpieza en una oficina. Necesita aumentar sus ventas es por eso que solicita un prstamo para compra de mercanca y aprovechar las ofertas de navideas. Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y proporcionarles un mejor futuro. Y con esta inversin su negocio tendr ms ganancias.
texts.en: Rosa Mara is divorced; she has two children in her care. She sells beauty products via catalogue sales and also works cleaning an office. She needs to increase sales and this is why shes asking for a loan to buy merchandise and take advantage of Christmas specials. She wants to improve her familys quality of life and provide a better future for them. With this investment, her business will have more profits.

loan.use: to buy merchandise and items on special Christmas mark-downs.

loan.name: Eliana

texts.es: Eliana cuenta desde hace 10 meses con un local donde vende productos qumicos, naturales y veterinarios. Los productos que ofrece tienen muy buena acogida en el barrio donde habita y en sus aledaos; la ubicacin de su negocio es una gran fortaleza pues se encuentra ubicada en la va principal, por donde transitan normalmente un gran nmero de personas de esta zona. Su negocio debe permanecer siempre surtido con muchas lneas de productos, porque maneja una rotacin que as lo exiAl analizar el estado de resultados del negocio de Eliana, se puede observar un buen nivel de ventas, que le permiten cubrir los costos operacionales, gastos familiares y reinvertir en el negocio; su balance muestra un rubro de gran tamao, que es el de inventario, debido a la diversidad de productos que ofrece, por eso para ella es una gran ventaja mantener un Stop aceptable en cada uno de ellos. En su sueo de crecimiento Eliana, necesita invertir en mayores cantidades los productos que ms rotan y que ofrecen descuentos especiales que le permitan ganar un poco ms. Esta es la razn de estar aplicando a su primer financiamiento con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprar de contado y de oportunidad, propolio zarzaparrilla miel de abeja, escoba, purgante, aceite relajante jabn, ceras y escancias; con su credikiva planea hacerlo para financiar su cartera de crdito, porque dispone de muy poco efectivo disponible para hacer compras. Su xito radica en fomentar mayores utilidades con un crdito a bajo costo y lograr una respuesta siempre oportuna a sus clientes a los que cuida para poder surgir como ella lo pretende.
texts.en:
Eliana opened a store ten months ago where she sells natural and chemical veterinary products. The products she sells are widely sought-after in the neighborhood where she lives and in surrounding areas. Her stores location is very strong since its on the main road where many local residents normally pass by. Her store must always be well stocked with many product lines because she manages a stock turn over that demands it.
Upon analyzing the state of Elianas business results, one can observe a good sales level that allows her to meet occupational costs, family expenses and to reinvest in the business. Her balance shows a line of work thats large, which is the inventory, due to the large variety of products she offers. For her, then, its most advantageous to keep in stock acceptable levels of each. In Elianas dream of growth, she needs to invest in larger amounts of the items that sell the most and which are on special markdown that will allow her to earn a bit more profit.
This is the reason behind her first loan application with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo that shell use to pay cash and special rates for Propoleo [syrup made from honey], sarsaparilla, honey, escoba [medicinal plant], emetics, relaxation oil, soap, wax and essences. She plans to use her Kiva loan to finance her credit portfolio since she has very little cash available to make her purchases. Her success resides in pushing higher profits with a low-cost loan to attain opportune response from customers who she cares for so that she can attain the growth she aims for.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: San Rafael Group

texts.es: La formacin D. este comit fue gracias a una D. las miembros quien oy hablar del programa D. mujeres emprendedoras D. la fundacin y comento a sus amigas y vecinas, quienes gustosas aceptaron formar parte D. este programa. Ellas actualmente se encuentran en ciclo doce, con 12 integrantes, todas ellas participan muy activamente en las actividades. Una D. ellas es la seora Mirtha, quien se dedica a la venta D. quesos. Comenta que sus productos tienen mucha salida por lo que le gustara poder seguir con el,ya que gracias a eso tiene muy buenos ingresos. Dice que todo el trabajo que ella hace es por darle a su familia todo lo que ellos necesitan. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. quesos, con lo cual podr abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda D. sus clientes.
texts.en:
This committee was formed thanks to one of the members who heard talk about the Fundacin enterprising women program and commented to her friends and neighbors who happily agreed to be part of this program. They are currently in their 12th cycle with 12 members; they all participate very actively in the activities.
One of them is Mirtha who sells cheese. She comments that her products sell well so shed like to continue in business because thanks to it she earns good income. She says that all the work she does is to give her family everything they need.
She asks for the loan to buy cheeses to stock up and meet customer demand.

loan.use: to buy cheeses for subsequent resale.

loan.name: Mujeres Unidas Para Mejor Futuro 4 Group

texts.en:
Yohanni is a young woman with a child. She lives in a zone of little resources in the city of Santiago, which is one of the most populated in the Dominican Republic. Yohanni says her most favorites things to do are reading and watching television. She operates a nail salon where she serves her customers with manicures, pedicures, and placing artificial nails sevices.
Yohanni is receiving her first loan from Esperanza Internacional and will invest this capital to buy nail polish, acrylic nails, and others materials. She started her business 3 years ago with her own savings after she learned how to work with nails. With her business profits she will reinvest in her business. She dreams of having a nail and beauty salon in a better location.
Yohanni and her group are going to devote themselves to various areas of work such as clothes, cosmetics, shoes, beauty salons, grocery stores etc. Thanks for supporting this group of entrepreneurs!

loan.use: to buy nail polish and acrylic nails

loan.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es: El seor Juan Manuel es mecnico tiene 20 aos dedicndose a este oficio, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Donde su vivienda es pequea por lo que empez a construir mas cuartos en la planta alta, pero le esta haciendo falta la losa de concreto ya que necesitan sus hijos su propio espacio en la casa. Desea tener un mejor patrimonio, seguridad y comodidad de su familia.
texts.en: Juan Manuel is a mechanic who has 20 years of experience in that profession; he is married and has two children. His house is small, and therefore he started constructing more rooms on the top floor. However, he lacks concrete slabs for construction, and his children need their own space in the house. Juan Manuel wants his family to have more wealth, security, and comfort.

loan.use: to purchase concrete slabs for construction.

loan.name: Yeny

texts.es: Yeny, de 33 aos es una mujer amable. Hace 12 aos que form su familia; donde tuvo 4 hijos pero solo vive con 3 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Ella es una mujer luchadora trabaja con ahnco para salir adelante. Hace 3 aos su economa se estableci, pues comenz a trabajar en una empresa exportadora de alcachofas, donde tiene un salario mensual, muy bueno y estable. Adems por las tardes cra ovejas, las que enseba para luego venderlas a un mayor precio. Durante 2 das al mes, se esmera para tener su hogar limpio, pues su esposo regresa de trabajar en la mina durante varios das, para dejar dinero y pasar un tiempo con sus hijos. Eso le gusta mucho a l. Ahora desean juntar dinero para solventar los estudios de sus hijos, quienes estn creciendo y ya deben postular a la universidad. Para ello, quiere aprovechar la temporada de navidad y vender productos de la poca. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario palomitas y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, pues hace posible que contine en su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le agrada trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Yeny de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de diversos y surtidos adornos para navidad, pues quiere aprovechar la temporada que se avecina.
texts.en:
Yeny is 33, and a friendly woman. She started her family 12 years ago, and has four children; but only three of them live with her in the house she owns, which is located in the village of Ataura.
She is a determined woman who works hard to get ahead. Her finances stabilized three years ago, as she started working at a company that exports artichokes. There she has a very good, steady, monthly salary.
Also, in the afternoons, she raises sheep, which she fattens and then sells at a better price. For two days a month, she does her best to have a clean home, as her husband returns for several days from working in the mines. He does this to leave money and spend time with his children. He really likes that. Now they wish to save money to pay for their children's education, as they are growing up, and already must apply for university.
That's why she wants to take advantage of the Christmas season and sell seasonal products.
She belongs to the "Palomitas" solidarity group, and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support all of you have given her, as it makes it possible for her to continue with her business. In addition, she promises to make her payments on time, as she likes to work with responsible and supportive people.
Once she receives her loan, Yeny will use the money she applied for to buy various and assorted Christmas decorations, as she wants to take advantage of the approaching season.

loan.use: To buy decorations with Christmas motifs for sale.

loan.name: Unidad De Santa Clara Group

texts.es: El comit "Unidas de Santa Clara" surgi a travs de una promocin que se realiz en la zona. Las integrantes viven en el mismo barrio y se conocen hace tiempo, por lo que ya han hecho una buena amistad. Ellas tienen por objetivos fomentar el espiritu emprendedor, la solidaridad y llegar al nivel mximo del programa de la fundacin. Mirta es una de las miembros, nos comenta que se dedica a la elaboracin de confites de todo tipo, en lo cual le va muy bien. Dice que gracias a sus buenas manos con los dulces es que le va muy bien. Comenta que hace confites para todo tipo de eventos y gracias a eso se ha hecho muy conocida. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de harina, huevos, manteca y dems ingredientes para la elaboracin de confites. Agradece a la fundacin y a kiva por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The "Unidas de Santa Clara" communal bank came about through an outreach campaign that was carried out in the area. The members live in the same neighborhood, and have known each other for some time, so they have already formed a good friendship. They have as their objectives: promoting an enterprising spirit, mutual support, and reaching the highest level of the Foundation's program.
Mirta is one of the members. She says that she makes sweets of all kinds, and that it is going very well. She says that she makes the sweets for all kinds of events, and thanks to that she has become very well known. She is asking for the loan to buy flour, eggs, lard, and the rest of the ingredients for making sweets.
She is grateful to the Foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity she has been given.

loan.use: To buy flour, eggs, lard, and other ingredients.

loan.name: Emperatriz Mara

texts.es: Emperatriz con su anterior credikiva compr ropa, calzado, y juguetes que vendi y obtuvo muy buenas ganancias. En la actualidad est aplicando a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprar ropa, calzado, que tiene encargada para la temporada de fin de ao, donde todos cambian su ajuar de ropas y sus clientes no sern la excepcin, as mismo pintar su preescolar preparandose para el nuevo ao escolar 2012. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente:" Gracias a ustedes he logrado salir adelante con mi negocio, porque son creditos con bajas tasas de financiacin, por ello resultan muy atractivos, por eso espero me apoyen nuevamente."
texts.en:
With her previous Kiva loan, Emperatriz purchased clothing, footwear and toys which she then sold for a good profit. Currently she is applying for a new Kiva loan with which she will buy clothing and footwear for which she has orders for the end of the year season. During this season everyone changes their wardrobe and her customers will be no exception.
She will also paint her pre-school in preparation for the new 2012 school year. Her message to her financial supporters is the following: "Thanks to you I have been able to get ahead with my business, because the loans have low interest rates and turn out to be very helpful. So I hope that you will support me again."

loan.use: to buy clothing and footwear and to paint her pre-school education center.

loan.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 22 aos es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compaa de su nico hijo Rolando a quien cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Ella es una valiente madre soltera, su vida centra en cuidar a su hijo. Para eso realiza varias actividades, durante la maana prepara los ricos panes y rosquitas tpicas de zona, pues tiene que abastecer los pedidos que tiene, adems ella misma vende en la feria que se realiza en la ciudad de Jauja, una vez por semana. Asimismo todas las tardes vende comida a los trabajadores de la escuela que se est construyendo, ya por la noche vende hamburguesas y papas al hilo con cremas ricas. Todos estos trabajos le ayudan a ser una mujer independiente y sobre todo a mantener a su hijo, darle comida, vestido y estudio. Lo que ella ms quiere es verlo crecer y salir adelante con una carrera universitaria. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario palomitas y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, pues hace posible que contine con su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le agrada trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Elizabeth de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos como harina, manteca, por kilos, mantequilla y huevos por decenas para preparar los ricos panetones para navidad.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a hard-working 22 year old woman. She lives with her only son Rolando, who she cares for in her own home which is located in the city of Ataura. She is a courageous single mother, and her life centers around caring for her son. In order to do so, she carries out several economic enterprises. During the morning she prepares the breads and pastries typical of the region, as she has to fulfill the requests that she receives. She also sells in person at the Jauja farmer's market that occurs once a week. In addition to all this, every afternoon she sells food to the construction workers who are building a local school and at night she sells hamburgers and shoe string fries with delicious sauces. All of these jobs help her to be an independent woman and above all help her take care of her son, feed him, give him clothes and provide for his education. What she wants the most is to see him grow and get ahead in life by getting a university degree. She belongs to a unified group called Palomitas, and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She is thankful for your support, as it makes it possible for her to continue with her work. She also promises to be punctual with her financial obligations, since it pleases her to work with such responsible and socially conscious people. Elizabeth, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested money in the purchase of supplies such as flour and animal fat (by the kilo) and butter and eggs (by the dozen) in order to prepare the tradtional and delicious Christmas bread called "panetones."

loan.use: To buy flour, butter and eggs in order to make the holiday bread called "panetones".

loan.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, de 50 aos es una mujer alegre. Ella tiene 5 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos: Yurica y Liz a las que cuida en casa de su madre ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Su madre hace muchos aos viajo a Estados Unidos, donde vive en la actualidad, por ello ella tuvo que encargarse de los bienes de la familia. Gracias a sus 7 parcelas, puede sembrar maz, papa y habas en cantidad. Cuida con mucho esmero, pues es uno de los mejores de la zona. Cuenta que en donde gana ms dinero, es en el maz, ya que hace secar para venderlos por arrobas, eso es su tcnica. Tambin cra animales, ya tienen varias gallinas, 40 cuyes y 10 conejos, los cuales le brindan ganancias extra, ya que los engorda para luego vender a un mayor precio en la ciudad de Lima y Cerro de Pasco donde tiene buenos clientes, adems aprovecha para visitar a sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario palomitas y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, pues hace posible que contine con su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le agrada trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Gloria, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus sembros de maz; ya que en esta temporada es donde ms sale.
texts.en:
Gloria, 50, is a cheerful woman. She has 5 children but only 2 of them live with her: Yurica and Liz are the two she cares for in her mother's house, which is located in the town of Ataura. Many years ago her mother went to the United States, where she lives now, so she had to take care of the family assets. Thanks to her 7 plots of land, Gloria can plant corn, potatoes and beans in bulk. She handles the farm with great care, so it is one of the best in the area. She says that where she earns more money is in corn, so she dries it to sell by the bushel; that's her technique.
Gloria also raises animals and has several chickens, 40 guinea pigs and 10 rabbits, which gives her extra income. She fattens the animals and then sells them at a higher price in the city of Lima and Cerro de Pasco where she has good clients. She also takes the opportunity to visit her children.
Gloria belongs to the Communal Bank "Palomitas (Popcorn)" and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She thanks all of you for your support; it makes it possible for her to continue with her work. Gloria also promises to be punctual with her dues, and she likes working with people who are responsible and caring. Gloria, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested money in purchasing natural fertilizer for her crops of corn, because this is the harvesting season.

loan.use: to buy bags of fertilizer.

loan.name: Socias Por Siempre Group

texts.es:
La A.C. SOCIAS POR SIEMPRE iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, est compuesta por seis integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Rosa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: costura de pantalones, tienda de carne, tejido de lana a macram, venta de comida, ventad e chuo y papa, tienda de abarrotes.
La seora Rosa, indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tiende a barrio que viene trabajando hace aos atrs, aprendiendo el mismo de su suegra. El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de viveres) que adquirir de la Ceja y posteriormente lo vender en su puesto comercial. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera.
texts.en:
The SOCIAS POR SIEMPRE Communal Bank is starting out on their first loan with Pro Mujer, as part of the field partner's local centre in the Andes. The group is made up of six members and directed by a board led by Seora Rosa. The businesses run by the members of the group include: making trousers, a butcher's shop, weaving string into macram handicrafts, selling food, selling potatoes and dried potatoes, and selling groceries.
Seora Rosa says this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she joined the organisation after being invited by a promoter. She presently has a shop in her neighbourhood, where she has been working for several years, having learned her business from her mother-in-law. The loan she will recieve is to increase her capital, to buy groceries, which she will get from the La Ceja market, and which she will then sell in her store. This type of work enables her to generate income to support her family, as she is not married.

loan.use: To buy groceries

loan.name: Rafael

texts.es:
El seor Rafael reside en el municipio de Choloma. Tiene 39 aos de edad y lleva 19 aos con su pareja Ana, la cual es ama de casa. Ana tiene dos hijas de una relacin anterior que viven con ellos. Las dos han terminado sus estudios. La familia depende de los ingresos de Rafael para sostenerse.
Rafael se especializa en la compra, reparacin y venta de electrnicos como televisores, equipos de sonido, ventiladores, etctera. Desde pequeo aprendi el oficio de reparaciones electrnicas y luego comenz a vender por su cuenta. Le gener buenos ingresos as que decidi empezar su propio negocio hace 4 aos. Hoy en da dedica de 10 a 11 horas diarias al negocio.
Con este crdito de L10,000, Rafael va a comprar electrnicos en mal estado para surtir su inventario. Desea crecer su negocio y sacar adelante a su familia con una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rafael lives in the town of Choloma. Hes 39 years old and has been together with his spouse, Ana, for 19 years; shes a housewife. Ana has two daughters from a prior relationship that live with them. Both of them have completed their studies. The family depends on Rafaels income to support themselves.
Rafael works buying, repairing and then reselling electronic devices like television sets, sound equipment, fans, etc. He learned how to repair electronic devices when still a young boy and then started selling on his own. It produced good profits so he decided to start his own business four years ago. Today, he dedicates 10 to 11 hours daily to the business.
With this L10,000 loan Rafael will buy electronic devices in poor condition to stock his inventory. He wants to grow in business and move his family ahead with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy electronic devices in poor condition.

loan.name: Christian Rolando

texts.es: El Sr. Christian tiene 37 aos de edad, est acompaado con la Sra. Olga de 27 aos, tienen la dicha de tener 2 hijos, quienes son el motor de la vida de ellos. El Sr. Christian se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas y bebidas, comenta que trabaja en esto hace 2 aos. Anteriormente se encontraba trabajando en el exterior con su compaera, pero pudieron hacerse de capital para emprender el negocio, y en la actualidad ya les va muy bien, pues tienen muy buena clientela y muy buena venta. Solicit este crdito para la compra de bebidas, hamburguesas, tomates y dems, ya que cuenta con muy buena demanda en la venta de sus productos. Tiene como anhelo ir creciendo da a da con su negocio para poder brindarles una vida digna a su familia.-
texts.en: Seor Christian is 37 years old and lives with his partner, Seora Olga, who is 27. They are blessed with 2 children, who are the motivation for all that they do. Seor Christian works selling hamburgers and drinks, and has been doing so for 2 years. Previously he could be found working outdoors with Seora Olga, but they were able to raise enough capital to start their business, and it is now going very well. They have a good customer base adn very good sales. He is seeking the loan to buy drinks, hamburgers, tomatoes and other things, because there is great demand for his wares. He aims to go on growing the business day by day, so that he is able to offer his family a decent life.

loan.use: To buy hamburgers and drinks to stock his snack-bar.

loan.name: Elia

texts.es: Elia Puntarenas 300000 Elia tiene una panadera en la zona de Puntarenas, a pesar de lo cercano de la ciudad ella vive en un lugar de bastante pobreza y donde el comercio existente es poco, provee a los habitantes del lugar la venta de pan fresco para su desayuno diario. La Panadera Elia tiene ms de 10 aos de existir, es un negocio familiar, ella trabaja con su esposo e hijos. El objetivo de este crdito es invertir en la reparacin de horno para incrementar as la produccin de su pan. Su da inicia a las 4 de la maana cuando se empieza a hornear el pan que se prepara la noche anterior, la panadera empieza a vender a partir de la 5:30 am por lo que la labor empieza desde tempranas horas de la maana, sus hijos son mayores de edad por lo que no tiene que ir a la escuela, ms bien entre todos apoyan la labor de esta microempresa, ya que tambin se distribuye el producto en pulperas de la zona, mejorando as los ingresos de la actividad y expandiendo sus operaciones para dar a conocer su producto. Entre sus metas esta mejorar su equipo, modernizndolo para mejorar la calidad del mismo y la eficiencia en su produccin. Abrir sucursales y mejorar las condiciones de su familia. Ella emigr de Nicaragua en los aos 80, y se estableci aqu con sus hijos, a los que les dio educacin y les enseo un oficio, que ahora ellos practican, una de sus hijas tiene otra panadera. Su negocio ha caminado muy bien, ya tiene cerca de 10 aos de trabajar en este, por lo que el principal problema es la falta de dinero para invertir en el mismo, pero con la oportunidad brindada por Fundacin Mujer por medio de KIVA, con este prstamo se va a mejorar mucho la capacidad del negocio.
texts.en:
Elia has a bakery in Puntarenas. Although it is close to the city, the area where she lives is very poor. The little commercial activity that exists there is small scale. Elia provides the local residents with fresh bread each day. Her bakery, Panadera Elia, has been around for more than 10 years, nad is a family business where she works with her husband and children. The purpose of the loan is to invest in getting an oven repaired to increase the quantity of bread they make.
Her day begins at 4am when she starts baking the bread she has prepared the night before. The bakery opens for business at 5.30am for people who have to to work early in the morning. Their children are grown up and don't have to go to school, so they can help by working in the bakery and by distributing the produce to local grocery stores, which increases the income to the business and expands the operation to get their products known.
Among their goals are to improve the bakery's equipment, modernising it to improve the quality and effiicency of production. They would like to open other branches of the business and to improve the family's standard of living. Elia emigrated from Nicaragua in the 1980s, and established herself here with her children, whom she has given both an education and a trade for them to follow. One of her daughters now runs a bakery of her own.
Her business has progressed well in the past 10 years. The main problem has been the lack of money to invest back into the business, but with the opportunity offered through Fundacin Mujer and KIVA, this loan means she can greatly increase the capacity of her business.

loan.use: To repair an oven for bread-making.

loan.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel de 46 aos de edad es una mujer casada que vive en el barrio Simn Bolvar con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 17 a 25 aos de edad. All se dedica a la venta de mercanca variada, negocio que inici entusiasmada por su prima, quien estaba vinculada a una empresa de productos a travs de guas especializadas; Maribel en un principio compraba estos productos mediante el cdigo de su prima y los pagaba en dos partidas; en la medida en que increment su clientela, se vincul directamente y hoy es ella quien los ofrece y con ello ha logrado mucha ms utilidades, as como premios y esto obedece al enfoque altamente comercial de Maribel. En la actualidad maneja la misma estrategia con otra amiga y en su casa posee una vitrina, en la que exhibe sus productos, pues quiere convertir su punto comercial en una gran miscelnea, con mucho surtido, para que su clientela encuentre todo lo que busca y no la cambien por su competencia. Con su negocio ha logrado apoyar el bienestar de su familia y por eso sus sueos de hacerlo crecer no se detienen, esta es la razn por la que acude a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, pues quiere acceder a su primer credikiva, con el cual comprar mercanca variada y una nueva vitrina, que surtira totalmente y con ello ser exitosa, pues aplicar esta estrategia de inversin, en una poca en que tradicionalmente hay un importante repunte de las ventas, como lo es el final del ao, que se viene con primas bonificaciones y mucha fiesta.
texts.en: Maribel is a 46 year-old married woman who lives in a neighborhood called Simn Bolvar with her husband and 2 children, ages 17 and 25. She does retail sales of a wide array of products. Her cousin, who participated in an enterprises catalogue sales scheme, motivated her to start her business. In the beginning, Maribel used to buy her products with her cousins code, paying them in two installments. As her clientele increased, she subscribed directly to the enterprise. This has brought her greater profits and prizes thanks to her highly commercial profile. Currently, Maribel uses the same strategy with another friend. She has a display case in her house where she exhibits her products. She wants to turn her selling point into a big miscellaneous store, fully stocked, so her clients can find everything they are looking for and dont go to the competition. With her business, Maribel has been able to support her familys wellbeing. That is why she cant stop dreaming about making her business grow. It is also why she turned to our institution asking for a Kiva loan, with which she will buy diverse products and a display case that will be fully stocked. She expects to be successful because she will use this investment strategy at a time of the year where sales usually rise. Namely, the end of the year, when people receive extra salaries and bonuses and there are a lot of celebrations going on.

loan.use: to purchase different products and a display case for exhibiting them

loan.name: Benita

texts.es: La seora Benita es de la ciudad de Santan, est casada, con hijos, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Benita es duea de una pequea despensita. La seora empez vendiendo mandioca y verduras en un carro por la zona de Bertoni, y sueo era de tener un puesto de venta en el mercado de Santan, cosa no se le dio por la circunstancias de la vida, entonces sigui su trabajo de siempre hasta que lleg a poner un copetn en su casa y con el pasar de los tiempos concret su sueo de tener una despensa y ventas de verduras en su propio domicilio, gracias tambin a la ayuda que la Fundacin Paraguaya le brinda por cada crdito que le otorga. Esta vez solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, panificados, y dems insumos para abastecer su negocio, pues siempre tiene muchos clientes y le gustara estar siempre lista. Agradece a la fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en: Seora Benita is from the city of Santan. She is married with children, and her husband is a farmer. Benita runs a small grocery store. She started out selling cassava and vegetables from a cart around the Bertoni district, and dreamt of having a fixed location in the market in Santan - something that her circumstances then would not allow. So she kept working and working until she was able to set up a snack bar in her house, and over time she realised her dream of having a grocery and selling vegetables from her own premises. This was thanks also to the support of Fundacin Paraguaya who granted her the loans she sought. This time she is seeking a loan to buy foods, drinks, baked goods, and other groceries to stock her business, because she always has a lot of customers and she likes to be ready to serve them. She is grateful to the Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity they are offering.

loan.use: To buy foods, drinks, baked goods, and other grocery items

loan.name: Bautista Triunfador Group

texts.es:
La A.C. BAUTISTA TRIUNFADOR iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, est compuesta por siete integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Vernica. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, venta de gelatina, carpintera, costura, tejido de mantas.
La seora Vernica, indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tiende a barrio que viene trabajando hace aos atrs.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de vveres) que adquirir de las mayoristas y posteriormente lo vender en su puesto comercial. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitacin en salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank Bautista Triunfador will begin its first cycle as part of the Los Andes regional office and it is made up of 7 members with a board headed by Vernica. The members of the communal bank have various businesses among which are neighborhood grocery store, selling gelatin, carpentry, seamstress, and knitting blankets.
Vernica says that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she joined the communal bank through a promotional invitation. Currently she has a neighborhood grocery store where she has been working for some years.
She will use the money from this loan to increase her capital so she can buy groceries from wholesalers and then sell them later in her business. This form of work permits her to earn income in order to support her family. She is married and has 4 children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the health training.

loan.use: to buy groceries

loan.name: Juan Gabriel

texts.es: El seor Juan Gabriel es padre D. familia y esta construyendo un cuarto en L. planta alta D. su casa. Al terminar L. recamara tendr mas espacio en su vivienda, ya que actualmente cuenta con un solo cuarto y le esta haciendo falta otro el cuarto que ser para su hija quien esta creciendo y necesita su propio espacio en L. casa. Don Gabriel trabaja en una compaa D. transportes desD. hace ms D. once aos y su esposo trabaja en L. limpieza D. casas particulares desD. hace 7 aos. El mejoramiento D. L. vivienda es para brindar le comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Gabriel is the father of a family, and he is building a room on the second story of his house. When he finishes the bedroom he will have more space in his home. Currently he has only one bedroom and he needs another one for his daughter, who is growing up and needs her own space in the house.
Gabriel has worked for a transportation company for more than eleven years and his wife has worked cleaning private homes for seven years.
The home improvement is to give his family comfort.

loan.use: to finish a room on the second story.

loan.name: Cristo Es La Esperanza 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Martires is the coordinator of her group, Cristo es la esperanza 1 & 2 (Christ is the hope). All the members of this group are Haitians and they are located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, where the sugarcane harvest and tourist industry dominate the economy. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and three children. She says that her most difficult challenge is to recover the payment when she gives credit to her clients.
Martires is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for around 16 years, starting with a small amount of capital that she saved. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business to buy some sugar, rice, vegetables, meat, cooking oil, plantain, flour, etc. She operates a Colmado, a place where you can find all the ingredients to make your daily food. Normally those colmados are in the same neighborhood, just a short walk from any home. With her business profits she has been improving her business

loan.use: to buy sugar, rice, vegetables, meat, cooking oil, plantain, flour, etc

loan.name: Ariel Esneider

texts.es: El seor Ariel a sus 22 aos de edad, se dedica a trabajar en su propia tienda desde hace un ao, en la cual vende productos como granos, frutas y verduras, snakcs, helados, productos para el aseo personal y para el hogar. El seor Ariel trabaja solo de lunes a lunes en el horario de 7:00 am a 10 pm. Esta actividad de la tienda la aprendi de manera autnoma y sin ayuda de nadie. Actualmente el seor Ariel desea comprar ms surtido para su tienda como granos, frutas y verduras, snakcs, helados y productos navideos, esto con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos mejorar la calidad de vida de l y su familia. A futuro el seor Ariel desea tener su tienda ms grande en la cual pueda trabajar con su familia.
texts.en:
Ariel is 22 years old and has been working in his own store for a year. He sells products such as grains, fruits and vegetables, snacks, ice cream, personal hygiene items, and supplies for the home. Ariel works alone 7 days a week from 7:00AM until 10:00PM. He learned the grocery business on his own without help from anyone.
Right now Ariel wants to buy more selections for his store such as grains, fruits and vegetables, snacks, ice cream and items for Christmas. This will increase his income and the quality of life for him and his family. In the future Ariel wants to have a larger store in which he can work with his family.

loan.use: to buy supplies such as fruit and vegetables, snacks, ice cream, and sweets

loan.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es: Cesar, de 31 aos de edad, habitante de Condega municipio de Estel, tiene un hijo de 11 aos de edad. El es comerciante dueo de una pulpera. Comenz con este negocio Hace 5 aos cuando regreso de Costa Rica en donde trabajo y con lo que gano regreso a su pueblo y estableci su pulpera con ayuda de su madre y su esposa el administra la venta donde el realiza las comprar para surtir la venta y ellas le ayudan atender ele negocio. Adicional el da clases de ingles en un instituto vocacional para jvenes donde este tipo de enseanzas en muy poca ya que la mayora de los jvenes e dedican a labores del campo y no tienen mucho acceso econmico para estudiar. El requiere el prstamo para surtir su pulpera de productos tales como enlatados, detergentes, gaseosas, jugos, pan, leche, huevo, pollo, arroz, azcar, frijoles, aceite ya que son parte del inventario que ms buscan sus clientes y de los cuales necesita mantener surtida su pulpera para vender. Entre sus planes segn nos cuenta el desea convertir su pulpera en una distribuidora de alimentos.
texts.en: Cesar, 31, lives in a neighborhood of Esteli called Condega. He has an 11-year old son. He owns a general store, a business that he started 5 years ago after returning from Costa Rica. He used the money that he earned before to stock the store and his wife and mother help him tend it. He also teaches English to young people at a local vocational school. The classes are welcome because it's not easy for local youths, most of whom work on area farms, to raise enough money to pay school fees. Cesar will use the loan to buy supplies of canned goods, detergents, soft drinks, juices, bread, milk, eggs, chicken, rice, sugar, beans and cooking oil, all of which are products that his customers most want to buy. In the future, he would like to develop a wholesale supply business.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for his general store.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy animals and supplies for farming business.

loan.name: Maria Minerva

texts.es: Minerva es una seora de 55 aos de edad quien vive con su hija en una pequea comunidad llamada la Trinchera de Pital localizada en la provincia de Alajuela; cuyas principales actividades productivas son la ganadera y la agricultura, donde destaca el cultivo de la pina; siendo estas comercializadas principalmente en los mercados internacionales. Por esta razn, el desarrollo de la comunidad ha venido creciendo en los ltimos anos generando una mayor demanda de productos y servicios brindando mayores oportunidades de trabajo. Minerva se dedica a la costura. Ella brinda sus servicios a los vecinos de la comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad. Actualmente Minerva est solicitando un microcrdito de 500,000.00 (quinientos mil colones), para la compra de una mquina de coser, ya que quiere solventar y tener otro ingreso econmico para su hogar. Con esta inversin espera que su microempresa crezca ms, para poder atender a mas clientes y ofrecerles mejores productos. Todo esto ayudara a mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Minerva es socio de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al xito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este ser su primer prstamo y con el espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y econmico, adems de participar activamente en la organizacin de crdito en su comunidad.
texts.en: Minerva, 55, lives with her daughter in Trinchera del Pital, a small town in Alajuela province. Farming and livestock-rearing are the base for the local economy. Pineapples, most of which are grown for export, are especially important here and have contributed to the town's prosperity. Economic growth has generated an increase in demand for products and services, along with new jobs. Minerva is a seamstress. She provides sewing services to people in the area who come to her because of the quality of her work. She's applying for a small loan of 500,000.00 (five-hundred thousand) colones that she will use to buy a sewing machine. The extra income will allow her to contribute to supporing her family. Minerva hopes the investment will allow her small business to keep on growing. She wants to add customers and provide better quality merchandise. She hopes, in turn, that the investment will approve her quality of life. Minerva is a member of the Mujeres al Exito community bank in Trinchera de Pital. The group is one of 150 groups sponsored by EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be her first loan and she hopes it will contribute to her personal growth as well as her family's well-being. She also wants to play a part in fostering this kind of lending in her community.

loan.use: to buy a sewing machine for her clothing business.

loan.name: El 13 Group

texts.es:
El grupo 13 lo conforman tres perdonas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Andrea de 56 aos quien todos los fines de semanas tiene una fritanga. Este negocio lo inicio con la venta de pasteles y poco a poco fue aumentando e invirtiendo en otros rubros.
Las otras integrantes son Silvia de 26 aos quien tiene un tortillera y Marisol de 39 aos quien vende productos Avon.
texts.en: The El 13 Group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising women, one of whom is 56-year-old Andrea who runs a fried food stand on weekends. She started this business selling cakes and little by little she expanded it and invested in other areas. The other group members are 26-year-old Silvia who has a tortilla shop and 39-year-old Marisol who sells Avon products.

loan.use: to buy groceries, meat, cabbage, corn, firewood, etc.

loan.name: Fe Group

texts.es: El grupo Fe lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Norma quien vende fritanga desde hace 7 aos. Este negocio lo inicio vendiendo verduras poco a poco comenz a invertir en otros rubros con el crdito anterior compr peroles, estufas y productos para la fritanga. Con el prstamo comprar materia primapara el negocio (granos basicos, queso, carne, lea...etc.) para salir adelante. Los otros integrantes son Misael quien tiene un taxi desde hace 8 aos e invertir en mantenimiento y Hazel de 26 aos vende cosmticos, ropa, fresco y helados desde hace 4 aos.
texts.en: The Group Fe (Faith) comprises three hardworking entrepreneurial people. One of them is Norma. She has been selling fried food for the last seven years. She started out selling vegetables and little by little started investing in other activities. With her previous loan, she bought pots, stoves and other products used for preparing fried food. This loan will help her to purchase supplies that will help her get through. The other members of the group are Misael, who has owned a taxi for eight years and plans to invest in its maintenance, and Hazel, 26, who has been selling make-up, clothes, drinks and ice cream for the last four years.

loan.use: to buy vegetables, basic grains, cheese, and meat for a food stand.

loan.name: Juana Estela

texts.es: Con el prstamo la seora Juana Estela podr surtir su negocio y ofrecer a sus clientes la variedad de mercanca que le estn solicitando que tenga a la venta en su negocio. Doa Juana Estela tiene aproximadamente dos aos con su negocio en el cual su esposo le apoya a tender a los clientes, cuando no tiene trabajo de albailera, con estos ingresos solventan los gastos de manutencin de sus cinco hijos, cuyas edades son de entre 8 aos y 2 aos de edad.
texts.en: With this loan, Juana Estela will be able to stock her business and offer her customers the diversity they are demanding. Juana Estela has had this business for approximately two years. When not working in construction, her husband helps her to serve her customers. This income helps them cover the maintenance expenses of their five children, aged 8 to 2.

loan.use: To stock her grocery store

loan.name: Carlos

texts.es: El seor Carlos es de la ciudad de Santan, vive en su propia casa con su esposa e hijos. Tiene 55 aos de edad, tiene varios hijos que ya son todos adultos. Es el dueo de una despensa, comenta que hace ya 10 aos que mantiene su negocio, por lo que ya tiene bastante experiencia en el comercio. Dice que todo el esfuerzo que hace es por tener una vejez digna y decorosa, ya que no quiere ser molestia para nadie. En cuanto a su negocio ya tiene muy buena clientela y siempre tiene muchos pedidos, es por ello que solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lcteos, panificados y dems productos,con los cuales podr abastecer su negocio y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Carlos is from Santan City. He lives in his own house with his wife and children. He is 55 and has several children, all of whom are adults. He says he has had his business for ten years so he has a lot of experience in commerce. He says he makes all this effort in order to live decently in his old age. He does not want to depend on anyone. As to his business, he already has a very good clientele and always has a very high demand. That is why he is asking for a loan in order to purchase groceries, drinks, diary, baked goods and other products that will allow him to stock his business and meet the demand of his customers.

loan.use: to purchase groceries, drinks, diary, baked goods and other products.

loan.name: Osman Ferney

texts.es: El Seor Osman a sus 26 aos de edad, se dedica a trabajar en la construccin cuando es contratado con personas naturales o con contratistas del municipio de Marinilla ubicado al oriente de Medelln. Esta labor la realiza Osman desde hace varios aos y le ha permitido llevar las obligaciones de su hogar y su familia. El seor Osman desea comprar herramienta de trabajo como lo son una pulidora y un taladro, que le permitan realizar con mayor facilidad su trabajo y no tenga que estar prestando la herramienta con otras personas. Con lo anterior su calidad de vida y el bienestar de su familiar podr aumentar.
texts.en:
Osman is 26 years old. He works in construction.
He has done contract work for individuals and for the Marinilla municipality located east of Medelln. Osman has done this work for several years and it has permitted him to cover the household and family expenses.
Osman wants to buy work-tools such as a polisher and a drill, which will make his work easier and he would not have to borrow tools from other people. This would allow the quality of life and wellbeing of his family to increase.

loan.use: to buy work-tools such as a polisher and a drill

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 38 aos es una mujer trabajadora, vive en compaa de Evadio su esposo desde hace 8 aos. Ambos tienen una hija, Andrea a la que cuidan en casa de su mam, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. A pesar de no contar con terrenos propios, ella obtiene buenas ganancias, pues busca socias quienes le brindan terrenos productivos para sembrar a cambio de que ella cuide los cultivos y fertilice. El dinero de la cosecha lo reparten de manera equitativa. Sus alimentos constan de, papa, alfalfa, habas y maz. Ya tiene 4 aos de experiencia, en todo este tiempo tambin se dedic al cuidado de sus animales como: ovejas, vacas y cuyes, los que vende a los carniceros, cuando tiene algn apuro. Ahora sembrar papa y desea comprar ms ovejas; pues est esperando a su esposo que trabaja en la mina de Casapalca, el llega despus de 15 das, para ayudar a voltear la tierra y en otras labores agrcolas. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario palomitas y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, pues hace posible que contine con su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le agrada trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Rosa, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de alfalfa para sus animales.
texts.en:
Rosa, who is a hardworking, 38 year old woman, has lived with her husband Evadio for eight years. The two of them have a daughter, Andrea, who is being raised in her mother's house, which is located in the town of Ataura.
Although she does not have her own land, she makes a good profit. She is looking for partners who will offer her fertile land for planting in exchange for her looking after and fertilizing the crops. They would split the money from the harvest fairly.
Her crops are potatoes, alfalfa, beans, and corn. She has four years of experience, during which she has also made a living caring for animals like sheep, cows, and guinea pigs, which she sells to butchers when needed. Now she will plant potatoes and wants to buy more sheep, but she is waiting for her husband, who works in the Casapalca mine. He comes back in 15 days to to help till the land and do other agricultural work.
Rosa belongs to the solidarity group palomitas [little doves], and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She is grateful for all of your help, since you make it possible for her to continue working. Furthermore, she promises to be punctual in her payments, since it is a pleasure to work with supportive and responsible people. Rosa, upon receiving your help, will put the money towards buying alfalfa for her animals.

loan.use: to buy alfalfa as feed for her animals.

loan.name: Damasco Group

texts.es: El grupo Damasco est conformado por mujeres trabajadora y emprendedora una de ellas es Ivania de 40 aos quien vende nacatamales y perfumes desde hace 6 aos. Su meta es expandir el negocio con ms clientes y por hacer autosuficiente al negocio. Las otras integrantes son Claudia quien vende ropa y medicamentos naturales, Silvia vende tamales pisque y vende ropa, y Emerita vende ropa y sandalias.
texts.en:
The Damasco Group is made up of hard-working and enterprising women, one of whom is 40-year-old Ivania who has been selling Nicaraguan tamales and perfume for six years. Her goal is to expand her business with more customers and to make her business self sufficient.
The other group members are Claudia, who sells clothes and natural remedies, Silvia, who sells pisque tamales and clothes, and Emerita, who sells clothes and sandals.

loan.use: To buy corn, pork, basic grains, meat and clothes

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Mara, de 57 aos es una mujer admirable. Vive en compaa de sus 3 hijos y 3 nietos; en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Hace 6 aos enviud y cargo consigo muchas dificultades que afront sola, una de ellas es cuidar de su hija mayor que es minusvlida, pues no puede caminar. Eso la motiva mucho ms, comenzando a trabajar con ahnco para tener un negocio propio y de esa manera solventar su economa. Es as que abrieron un restaurante en la plaza de su zona, ah los turistas y la poblacin la visita con frecuencia, pues saben de la exquisita sazn de Mara. Pero como ella es una mujer del campo, tambin siembra maz y papa en grandes cantidades, los cuales realiza en terrenos agrcolas alquilados, pues no cuenta con unos propios. Ahora desea juntar el dinero necesario para poder comparar terrenos productivos y minimizar los costos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Hacienda y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Mara, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos de maz.
texts.en:
Mara who is 57 years old is an admirable woman. She lives with her three children and 3 grandchildren in her own house located in the town of Ataura.
She became a widow 6 years ago and has faced many difficulties. One of these is the care of her oldest daughter who is disabled and not able to walk. This was a major motivation for working enthusiastically to have her own business and in this way to earn money. So she opened a restaurant in the town square where the tourists and local people often go, knowing about Maras exquisite flavors.
But as she is also a field worker, she also grows large quantities of corn and potatoes on farming land which she currently rents, which is not the same as having her own. Now she wants to gather the money necessary to buy productive land to minimize costs.
She belongs to the communal bank Hacienda and this is the 4th loan with MFP, where she feels happy as she receives your support, all of you who have permitted her to continue in her business. Also, she promises to be punctual in her loan payments, because the communal bank is made up of trustworthy and caring people. Mara, upon receiving help, will use the money from the loan to buy natural fertilizers to spread about her corn crops

loan.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loan.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es: La seora Sonia es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella est casada. Ella es comerciante, es duea de un local de una peluqueria que realiza trabajos de todo tipo en cuanto a trabajos de belleza integral. Ella comenta que trabaja arduamente todos los das, pues siempre tiene muchos clientes, hace 10 aos que se dedica a esto y es por ello que ya tiene una vasta experiencia. Comenta que gracias a este negocio ella puede ayudar en la casa, con ello puede ayudar a su marido a aligerar un poco la carga del hogar. Debido a lo bien que le esta yendo, ella quiere abastecer su negocio, con todos los insumos fundamentales para su peluquera, como ser: tintes, esmaltes para uas, limas, quita esmaltes, qumicos para tratamientos y dems. Ella agradece a la fundacin y a kiva, por la oportunidad que estas le dan, pues el crdito le ser de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sonia is from the city of Pilar. She is married. She is a businesswoman; she owns a station in a hair salon that offers all kinds of services in terms of comprehensive beauty.
She tells us that she works hard every day, as she always has a lot of clients. She has been doing this for ten years now, so she has a lot of experience. She says that, thanks to this business, she is able to help at home; it allows her to help her husband lighten the household load.
Since her business is going so well, she wants to stock it up with all the fundamental supplies for her hair salon, such as dyes, nail polish, nail files, nail polish remover, chemicals for treatments, and more. She thanks the foundation and Kiva for the opportunity they have given her, as the loan will be of great help to her.

loan.use: to buy dyes, nail polish, nail files, nail polish remover, chemicals, and more

loan.name: Jenny Alejandra

texts.es: La seora Jenny a sus 21 aos de edad es madre de un hijo de 5 aos, ella se dedica desde hace varios aos y en compaa de su esposo al cultivo de maz. Debido a la temporada invernal que ha afectado su cultivo, la seora Jenny requiere de la compra de insumos para su cultivo como riegos y abonos para fortalecerlo. Con lo anterior, la seora Jenny podr ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo y esposo. A futuro la seora Jenny suea con tener su propia finca y ver crecer a su hijo en un ambiente sano y lleno de amor.
texts.en: Jenny, 21, has a 5-year old son. For some years she and her husband have planted corn. The winter weather affected the plants and Jenny needs to buy supplies for them such as fertilizer and irrigation equipment to strengthen the crop. Jenny used the previous loan to give her husband and son a better quality of life. She dreams of having her own farm in the future and to see her son grow up healthy and full of love.

loan.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizer and irrigation equipment for the corn crop

loan.name: Viviana

texts.es: Viviana, D. 64 aos es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compaa D. su esposo Celso, con quien se cas desD. hace 44 aos. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo viven con una D. ellas en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad D. Ataura. A pesar D. su edad, es una mujer que no descansa. Sufri la prdida D. uno D. sus hijos, para ella fue muy triste, pero sabe que tiene que luchar por los que an viven. Su principal actividad econmica es la agricultura, siembra papa, maz, trigo, alverja, habas y alfalfa. Ya tiene 24 aos dedicndose a esto, sus principales cosechas los comercializa a la ciudad D. Lima, Oroya y Jauja, depenD. del precio en el mercado, afirma. En todo este tiempo pudo adquirir 5 hectreas D. terrenos productivos, animales como vacas, terneras y cuyes; que le generan un dinero extra. Ahora aprovecha la llegada D. una empresa importante D. telefona, a quienes prepara los alimentos del da a cambio D. un pago mensual, por lo que ahora est obteniendo mejores ingresos econmicos para el hogar. Ella pertenece al bA. comunal hacienda y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donD. se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo D. todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago D. sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Viviana D. recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra D. fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus cultivos D. maz y papa yungay que recin sembrar.
texts.en:
Viviana is 64 years old and a working woman. She lives with her husband Celso and they have been married 44 years. They have 5 children, but only one lives with them, in their own house, located in the town of Ataura. Despite her age, she is a woman who does not rest. She suffered the loss of one of her children, and was very sad, but she knows that she has to fight for the ones that are still alive.
Her main economical activity is agriculture. She grows potatoes, corn, wheat, peas, beans and alfalfa. She has been doing this for 24 years. She sells most of the crops in Lima, Oroya and Jauja, depending on the market price, she says. During this time she was able to buy 5 hectares of productive land, and animals such as cows, calves and guinea pigs, which bring in extra income. Now she is taking advantage of the arrival of an important telephone service, preparing daily food in exchange for a monthly payment, so now she is saving money on her household expenses.
She belongs to the community bank Hacienda and this is the 3rd loan with MFP, where she feels happy, because she receives the help of all of you, permitting her to go on with her business. Also, she promises to be punctual in her loan payments, as the community bank is maD. up of responsible and caring people. Upon receiving help she will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread about her corn and yungay potatoes (similar to a yellow potato) that were recently planted.

loan.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loan.name: Yessie Mercedes

texts.es: Yessie est estudiando Contabilidad, est cursando el ltimo ao de su carrera y solicita el crdito para pagar el curso de titulacin de su carrera. Su inspiracin ha sido su madre, ya que ella siempre ha buscado la manera de sacar a Yessie adelante y a motivarla para que nunca dejara de estudiar. Despus de finalizar su carrera, seguir estudiando, sacar una especializacin para ser Auditor. Le dedica mucho tiempo a sus estudios, diariamente despus del trabajo pasa algunas horas reforzando sus estudios.
texts.en: Yessie is studying accounting and is in the final year of her career and is asking for a loan in order to pay for the last year of studies. Her inspiration has been her mother, because she always has searched for ways to motivate Yessie to get ahead and to never stop studying. After she attains her degree, she will continue to study, going for a specialization in order to be an auditor. She studies all the time, daily, and after work she keeps reinforcing her studies.

loan.use: to pay the costs of her last year of study to obtain her degree

loan.name: Cristo Es La Esperanza 3, 5 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Yolanda is the coordinator of Cristo es la Esperanza 3, 4 & 5 (Christ is the hope). She lives with her long-term partner and their four children in a simple structure, located in a rural community in the city of La Romana. Specifically, the community is a batey (company town) founded for sugar cane workers where she, her family and the other 14 micro-entrepreneur women in this group reside.
Yolanda says that her most important challenge is to have a house in the main city and to raise, educate and support her children in all they may need. She operates a colmado, a place where you can find all the ingredients to make your daily food. Normally colmados are in the same neighborhood, just a short walk from any home. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business to buy sugar, rice, vegetables, canned food, cooking oil, flour, etc.
Part of this group for almost a year, Yolanda is excited to receive her third loan with Esperanza, each one helping her to improve her business. With her profits, she will reinvest in her business and save. Yolanda thanks all of you for your support of her business and her group.

loan.use: to buy sugar, rice, vegetables, canned food, cooking oil, flour, etc.

loan.name: Isabe

texts.es: Isabe, de 25 aos es una madre responsable. Vive en compaa de Juan, su esposo desde hace 7 aos. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Xiomara y Mayte a los que cuidan en casa de sus suegros, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Como una reciente pareja con responsabilidades. Ellos distribuyen sus actividades, su esposo se dedica al trabajo de carpintera, soldadura y mantenimiento del gobierno local de su zona, ah obtiene un dinero mensual, que le paga el estado peruano. Adems ella se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, cuenta con 30 ejemplares, los cuales comercializa en la ciudad de Jauja, durante la feria. Pero la actividad que realizan juntos es la agricultura, con la siembra de maz, papa y habas, los que realizan en terrenos agrcolas heredados, eso me permite ahorrar mucho, afirma. Ahora planean comprar sus casa propia, saben que con trabajo y ahorro lo lograrn. Ella pertenece al banco comunal hacienda y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Isabe de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla y fertilizantes naturales para su prxima siembra de alfalafa.
texts.en: Isabe is 25 years old and is a responsible mother. She lives with Juan, her husband of 7 years. They have 2 children, Xiomara and Mayte, who live with them in their in-laws home, located in the community of Ataura. As a young couple with responsibilities they divide up their activities. Juan makes a living from carpentry, welding, and doing maintenance work for the local government of their region, from which he earns a monthly income from the Peruvian government. Isabe makes a living raising guinea pigsshe has 30 of them, which she sells in the city of Jauja during its festival. The economic activity that the couple work on together, though, is farming: they grow corn, potatoes, and beans on their familys agricultural fields, which, as Isabe says, allows me to save a lot. They are now planning to purchase their own house, and they know that with hard work and saving they will achieve it. Isabe belongs to the Hacienda communal bank and this is her first loan with MFP. She is happy to receive your support, which will enable her to stay in business. She also promises to be punctual in making her payments, since her group is made up of responsible and supportive individuals. If Isabe receives your support then she will invest the money in purchasing seeds and natural fertilizer for her next crop of alfalfa.

loan.use: to purchase alfalfa seeds and bags of natural fertilizer.

loan.name: Jhossy

texts.es: Jhossy, de 27 aos es un hijo responsable; vive en compaa de su mam Gudelia, su pap Cirilo y su hermano pequeo Miguel a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. l trabajo al que se dedica este ejemplar hijo es la crianza de ovejas de raza Junn, que es su principal especialidad; ya que aprendi a cuidarlos y reproducirlos, pues tiene clientes ganaderos que compran sus ejemplares para sus rebaos, en especial machos que les sirven como reproductores. Esta actividad es mi principal distraccin, comenta. Adems estudi la carrera de ingeniera informtica, ahora se encuentra trabajando en un hospital del estado peruano en esa rea, ah recibe un sueldo mensual que le permite mantener la estabilidad econmica de su familia, pues apoya a su mam en los gastos del hogar. Entre sus planes se encuentra seguir estudiando y abrir un negocio slido que le permita sostener sus gastos a largo plazo. l pertenece al banco comunal hacienda y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Jhossy de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de ovejas de raza, para dinamizar su negocio.
texts.en: Jhossy is 27 years old. A responsible son, he lives in his own house in the community of Ataura with his mother Gudelia, his father Cirilo and his little brother Miguel, whom he provides for. This exemplary son is a shepherd and he breeds Junn sheep. This is his main specialty, as he has learned how to grow and breed them, because of some stockbreeders among his customers who buy his animals for their flocks, particularly rams needed for reproduction. This activity is my main pastime he says. He has also studied electronic and computing engineering, and he is now working in a Peruvian public hospital in his area. The monthly wage he earns from this job helps him providing economic stability to his family, as he support his mother in the payment of household expenses. Keeping on studying and establishing a strong activity that will help him paying for his expenses in the long ruin are two of his goals. He is a member of the Hacienda (Ranch) Communal Bank, and this is his third loan with MFP; he is happy about this because of the support he receives from all of you, thanks to which he is able to carry on with his activity. He commits to being punctual in repaying his dues, since, like all the members of his Communal Bank, he is a very responsible and caring person. With your support, Jhossy will invest the requested loan in the purchase of thoroughbred sheep in order to invigorate his activity.

loan.use: To buy thoroughbred sheep.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria de 42 aos vive en el municipio de Soledad con su cnyuge y su hijos de 15 y 24 aos de edad; all se dedica a la fabricacin y venta de alimentos; sus principales productos son las hayacas: Amasijo de maz, o arroz, relleno de verduras y carnes, envueltas en hojas de bijao; oficio que aprendi por tradicin familiar, pues en Ocaa un municipio de Norte de Santander, vio desde muy nia como sus grupo familiar preparaba el delicioso producto, que Maria perfecciono con el tiempo, especialmente cuando emigr de su natal Ocaa en busca de oportunidades, hacia la Costa Caribe de Colombia. Cuando inici lo hizo con un pequeo capital, llevando productos de tienda en tienda en su barrio, muy pronto empez a extenderse hacia las comunidades aledaas, donde por la calidad de sus productos y los buenos precios ha logrado concentrarse.
