Hoy quiere crecer an ms y ha escogido el mes de Diciembre, donde no solo las hayacas son compradas para venderlas, sino tambin para consumirlas directamente y esto es justamente lo que lograr impactar an ms sus ventas y con ello su crecimiento. Su sueo es lograr aumentar sus ingresos para continuar apoyando los estudios profesionales que iniciar su hija en el ao 2012. En la actualidad est aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar materias primas e insumos en mayor volumen, para lograr descuentos, y tambien invertir en una picadora, con la cual preparar sus hayacas de una manera ms efectiva y dar respuesta oportuna a sus clientes, en estas alegres fiestas de fin de ao, donde todos comparten comida y abundancia.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old and lives in the town of Soledad with her partner and her children who are 15 and 24 years old. She prepares and sells food. Her main product is hayacas: a dough made of corn or rice, filled with vegetables and meat, and wrapped in banana leaves. She first learned through family tradition, in Ocaa a town north of Santander. She watched from the time she was a young girl at family gatherings the preparation of this delicious food, which Maria perfected over time, especially when she emigrated from her birthplace of Ocaa in search of opportunities toward the Caribbean coast of Colombia.
She began with little funding, carrying her products from store to store in her neighborhood. Very soon she began to fan out to surrounding communities focusing on the quality of her products and good prices.
Today she wants to expand even more and has chosen the month of December, because not only are the hayacas purchased for resale, but also for immediate consumption, so this is just what she will accomplish, the sales will increase and so will her growth.
Her dream is to increase her profit in order to be able to continue supporting her daughter and paying for the professional studies that she will begin in 2012. At this time she is asking for a Kiva loan, her first loan that will be made through Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, to buy raw materials and supplies in greater volume, in order to obtain discounts, and also to buy a chopper with which to prepare hayacas in a more effective way, and to meet the requests of her clients during these Happy New Year celebrations where everyone shares food and abundance.

loan.use: to buy raw materials and supplies in greater volume, to receive a discount, and a chopper to use while preparing hayacas

loan.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es: El seor Luis Fernando a sus 63 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de leche desde hace 17 aos. Esta labor de ordeo de vacas la prendi desde nio de su padre quien en su finca tena varias vacas. En 1997, el seor Luis Fernando decide independizarse y tener su propio negocio de venta de leche a sus vecinos, amigos y familiares. Actualmente, el seor Luis Fernando desea comprar otra vaca lechera que le permita incrementar la venta de leche y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. En un futuro el seor Luis Fernando desea tener un mayor nmero de vacas y generar empleos directos en su comunidad.
texts.en: Luis Fernando is 63 years old. He has sold milk for 17 years. Working with cows started when he was a child since his father had some cows on his farm. In 1997, Luis Fernando decided make himself independent and to start his own business selling milk to his neighbors, friends and relatives. Now, Luis Fernando wants to buy another dairy cow to increase his milk sales. With this, he can increase his income and give his family a better quality of life. In the future, Luis Fernando wants to have a larger number of cows and generate jobs in his community.

loan.use: purchase a dairy cow.

loan.name: Celia Aydee

texts.es: La seora Celia Aydee esta casada y tiene una hija de diez aos de edad. Solicita un prstamo para la construccin del bardal alrededor de su casa ya que necesita comprar el material que es block, arena, cemento y varilla. Y as su familia se sentir ms protegida y segura ya que la seora Celia Aydee y su esposo el seor Antonio deseen darle lo mejor, por lo cual Doa Celia Aydee trabaja como empleada domestica en una casa particular y Don Antonio empleado de una centro comercial.
texts.en: Celia Aydee is married. She has a daughter who is ten years old. She is requesting a loan for the construction of a wall around her house. Now she needs buy supplies like bricks, sand, cement and bars. With this, her family will feel more protected and safer. Celia Aydee and Antonio, her husband, want to give their family the best. Celia Aydee works as a domestic worker in a private home. Antonio works in shopping center.

loan.use: build a wall around her home.

loan.name: Cristhian Antonio

texts.es: El Joven Cristhian tiene 26 aos de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres. Nos cuenta que tiene Despensa en la Ciudad de Villarrica, el cual est en un lugar bastante conocido en el centro y adems muy concurrido. Heredo el negocio de su madre, quien ya tenia una buena cantidad de clientes, pero el lo fue mejorando el negocio y ahora ya es ms que exitoso. El joven hoy en da se encarga de la administracin, y el local permanece abierto hasta alta horas de la noche. Acude a Fundacin Paraguaya para acceder a una pequea ayuda, que quiere invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como ser azcar, fideos, arroz, yerba y dems, con lo cual puede abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristhian is a young man of 26. He is single and lives with his parents. He talks about his general store in the city of Villarrica, which is well-known in the city center and also a busy area.
He inherited this business from his mother, who already had a good number of customers. However, he continued to improve it, and today it is more than successful. Today, this young man is in charge of managing the business, and the store remains open late into the night.
He came to the Fundacin Paraguaya to gain access to a small amount of help, which he would like to invest in buying products of daily use, such as sugar, noodles, rice, yerba mat, and other items, with which he can stock his business and satisfy his customers' needs.

loan.use: to buy sugar, noodles, rice, yerba mat and other products.

loan.name: Jonathan

texts.es: Johnatan, de 26 aos es un hombre responsable. Vive en compaa de su mam Elena en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. l es un joven con aspiraciones, hace poco termin la carrera tcnica de agronoma. Desde ese entonces son 4 aos de experiencia sembrando maz, de calidad en sus propios terrenos agrcolas, que le fueron heredados de parte de sus madre, a quien quiere mucho. Gracias a su conocimiento logr adquirir buenos ingresos, ahora desea ampliar sus conocimientos con una carrera universitario, eso es su objetivo. Para ello form una empresa de carpintera y construccin de obras de infraestructura para el sector pblico y privado. Gana muy bien en estas actividades, por eso est pensando contratar a profesionales para ampliar sus ganancias y tener ms clientes. l pertenece al banco comunal hacienda y este es el segundo crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Johnatan, de recibir su apoyo invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales y herramientas para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de maz.
texts.en: Jonathan, age 26, is a responsible man. He lives together with his mother, Elena, in their own house, located in the town of Ataura. He is a young man with aspirations, who recently completed a technical degree in agronomy. Since that time, he has had 4 years of experience growing high-quality corn on his own farmlands. This land was passed on to him by his mother, whom he loves very much. Thanks to his knowledge, he has been able to achieve a good level of income. Now he would like to broaden his knowledge with a university degree, which is his objective. For this purpose, he formed a company providing carpentry services and infrastructural project construction for the public and private sectors. He earns very well from these activities, and thus he is thinking of contracting professionals to broaden his earnings and have more customers. He belongs to the "Hacienda" communal bank, and this is his second loan with MFP, where he feels happy because he receives support from all of you, who permit him to continue with his business. He also promises to be punctual with his loan payments, since his association is made up of responsible people with a strong sense of solidarity. When he receives this support, Jonathan will invest the funds he is requesting in buying natural fertilizers and tools to maintain his corn crops.

loan.use: to buy tools and natural fertilizers.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Mara, de 44 aos es una mujer responsable. Vive en casa de su padre, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura; en compaa de sus 4 hijos, todos ellos mayores de edad, Ella trabaja en diversas actividades, pues gusta de estar activa y sentirse desarrollada. Durante las maanas se dedica a la venta de gelatina, tamales y rajadas de laa, en un cuarto que acondicion en su casa, es muy conocida tanto as que tiene clientes fijos; los que todos los das consumen los ricos alimentos que prepara. Por otro lado, tambin siembra maz, papa y alfalfa, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero, pues en cada cosecha los comerciantes mayoristas la visitan en sus mismos terrenos agrcolas. Ya tiene 24 aos de experiencia, en todo este tiempo aprendi a ahorrar, por ello cuenta con animales como: vacas, becerros y toros, los cuales vende cuando estn maduros. Ahora comenz a trabajar para el estado en una obra de carreteras, donde recibe un sueldo fijo, por lo que dure su contrato planea ahorrar para mejorar la infraestructura de su tienda. Ella pertenece al bA. comunal hacienda y este es el tercer crdito con MFP, donde se siente feliz, pues recibe el apoyo de todos ustedes, quienes le permiten seguir en su negocio. Adems promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociacin lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Mara, de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de rboles para realizar lea, asimismo en insumos para le elaboracin de gelatina y tamal para su negocio.
texts.en:
Mara, age 44, is a responsible woman. She lives at her fathers house, which is located in the town of Ataura, with her four siblings who are all grown. Mara works in different business activities because she enjoys being active and developing as a person. In the mornings she sells gelatins, tamales, and chopped firewood from a room in her house that is suitable for this business. She is well-known and has established customers who eat the delicious dishes she prepares every day. Mara also grows corn, potatoes, and alfafa and looks after her crops with great care. The wholesale merchants come to her land during each harvest. Mara has 24 years of experience. During this entire time, she has learned how to save in order to acquire animals such as cows, calves, and bulls that she sells once they have matured. Mara has now started a job with the state in which she works on a highway project. Through the duration of her contract, she plans to save toward making improvements to the infrastructure of her shop.

Mara is a member of the Communal Bank Hacienda and is taking her third loan with MFP. She is pleased with the support she has received from everyone. In addition, she promises to be prompt with her payments. Her Communal Bank consists of responsible and supportive individuals. Mara will invest the money she requested in the purchase of tree trunks for making firewood. She will also buy supplies for making gelatins and tamales for her business.

loan.use: to buy tree trunks for firewood and supplies for making gelatin and tamales.

loan.name: Zoraida

texts.es: Zoraida de 36 aos de edad se dedica a la venta de mercanca variada, ella vive en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, una poblacin a orillas del mar Caribe, con su cnyuge, quien es ayudante en un bus intermunicipal, y sus tres hijos en las edades de 2 a 13 aos. Sus principales mercancas son los jeans, camisas y calzado informal, tambin vende electrodomsticos menores, como licuadoras ollas, hornos entre otras. Sus clientes se encuentran en el mismo municipio de Puerto Colombia y los pagos de sus productos los hacen en dos o en tres partidas. Con la cercana del fin de ao, se han incrementado los pedidos de sus clientes y esta es la razn por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprar ropa calzado y juguetes para que sus clientes logren felizmente celebrar las navidades y ao nuevo.
texts.en: Zoraida, 36, makes her living selling a variety of merchandise. She lives in the town of Puerto Colombia, a city on the shores of the Caribbean Sea. Zoraida lives with her spouse, who is an assistant on an intercity bus, and their three children whose ages range from 2 to 13 years old. The main things she sells are jeans, shirts and casual footwear. She also sells small home appliances, like blenders, pots, stoves and other things. Her customers are also in the city of Puerto Colombia, and they purchase products by making two or three payments. As the end of the year approaches, her clients requests have increased, and this is the reason she has requested her Kiva loan. This is the first financing she has received from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to purchase clothing, shoes and toys so that her clients will be able to happily celebrate Christmas and New Years.

loan.use: to purchase clothing, shoes and toys.

loan.name: Luz Dary

texts.es: La seora Luz Dary a sus 42 aos de edad, se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y accesorios que ella misma elabora; esta actividad la realiza desde hace ms de 10 aos desde su casa, aunque en ciertas ocasiones es ella quien visita a sus clientes. Actualmente la seora Luz Dary desea comprar insumos como telas, hilos y accesorios que le permitan elaborar ms productos y as suplir la alta demanda de temporada de fin de ao y de esta manera incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida. A futuro la seora Luz Dary desea tener su propio almacn de ropa y accesorios.
texts.en:
Sra. Luz Dary is 42 years old. She sells clothing and accessories that she produces herself. Luz has been in this business for more than 10 years and works from home. On certain occasions, she will visit her customers.

Sra. Luz Dary wants to buy supplies such as fabrics, thread, and accessories so that she can produce more products and meet the high demand during the year-end season. This will help to increase her earnings and improve her quality of life. In the future, Sra. Luz Dary wants to have her own clothing and accessories store.

loan.use: to buy fabrics, thread, and accessories.

loan.name: Cristo Salva 6 & 7 Group

texts.en:
YoL. is the coordinator of the Cristo Salva Groups 6 & 7. Her family is made up of two children and her long-term partner. Her children are attending school, which has been her most difficult challenge because they are Haitian and they didn't know how to speak Spanish very well. She wants to have her house and a stable business, to save and live a tranquil and safe life.
YoL. is very excited to receive her second loan through Esperanza International. She took her first loan around 7 months ago and she is very grateful for the opportunity her neighbors gave her by inviting her to join the group. Receiving these loans has made possible the investment to her small business.
YoL. produces candy with traditional preparations. She makes candies from peanuts, coconut and milk. She sells them door-to-door by walking in the streets. She will invest by purchasing milk, sugar, coconut, peanuts, cinnamon, etc.
YoL. dreams of having a beautiful house and a successful business. This group is composed of 10 Haitian immigrants located in the city of La Romana, where tourists and sugarcane are the biggest industries. They all live in a rural area called Batey, surrounded by sugarcane fields.

loan.use: to buy milk, sugar, coconut, peanuts, cinnamon, etc.

loan.name: Johanna Juana

texts.es:
Johana de 33 aos, comenz ayudar a su madre a vender cosmticos, hasta que pudo independizarse y vende cosmticos por cuenta propia.
Trabaja todos los das y cuando llega una revista ofrece sus productos a amigos y familiares. Su nica dificultad es la delincuencia ya que recorre algunos sectores para vender sus productos.
Es madre soltera y con la ayuda de Dios saca adelante a sus 4 hijos de 17, 14, 4 y 3; los hijos mayores estudian en colegios fiscales. Ella quiere un prestamo para comprar cosmeticos, perfumes etc. Su meta es poder llegar a ser directora para as poder incrementar sus ventas
texts.en:
Johana is 33 years old and began helping her mother sell cosmetics until she became independent and started selling cosmetics on her own. She works every day and offers her products through catalogs to friends and relatives. Her only difficulty is dealing with the crime that exists in some of the neighborhoods where she sells her products.

Johana is a single mother. With Gods help, she has been able to assist her four children (ages 17, 14, 4, and 3) as they move forward. The older children attend public schools. Johanna wants a loan to buy cosmetics, perfumes, and other products. Her goal is to become a director so that she can increase her sales.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics, perfumes, and other products.

loan.name: Amalfi

texts.es: Amalfi, de 59 aos es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compaa de su esposo e hijos, a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ataura. Su dedicacin a la agricultura es sorprendente, todas las maanas desde muy temprano cuida de sus cultivos de maz, papa y alcachofa, le va muy bien en su trabajo. Sobre todo en sus cultivos de alcachofa, que son bien cotizados en el mercado, pues es uno de los alimentos que se exporta a otros pases; asiendo que sus cosechas sean compradas mucho antes de ser cosechadas, eso le ayuda a tener la estabilidad econmica que necesita. Adems cuida de animales como ovejas y cuyes los cuales cra para luego vender a los carniceros, que la visitan su casa con frecuencia. Ahora ella desea juntar dinero para tener ms terrenos agrcolas y as sembrar en mayor cantidad para obtener mejores ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal hacienda y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, pues hace posible que contine con su trabajo. Adems promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, ya que le agrada trabajar con personas responsables y solidarias. Amalfi de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias ovejas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Amalfi, 59, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her husband and children, who she cares for in her own home, located in Ataura. Her dedication to farming is surprising: very early every day, she cares for her crops of corn, potatoes and artichokes. Things are going very well for her in her work, especially with regards to her artichoke crops. Her artichokes are well sought-after in the market, since this is one of the foods that is exported to other countries. As a result, her harvests are purchased well before they are harvested which helps her have the financial stability that she needs.
Additionally, she cares for animals such as sheep and guinea pigs which she raises to sell to butchers, who visit her at her home frequently. Now she would like to raise some money to have more land for farming and, subsequently, plant more to obtain better results. She belongs to the Hacienda Communal Bank and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She appreciates the support of all of you because it makes it possible for her to continue with her work. She also promises to be punctual with her repayments, since she likes working with responsible, supportive people. When Amalfi receives the loan, she will invest the money requested in the purchase of several sheep for her business.

loan.use: to purchase sheep.
